Title: Can't return to who I was before
Author: K_R_Closson
Fandom: Star Wars Legends - All Media Types
Summary: Summary: After dying on the Death Star, Obi-Wan Kenobi expects to; well, die. Instead, he wakes up in the initiate dorms at the Coruscant Temple. The Force has sent him back in time, given him a second chance, and he knows what he needs to do. At twelve years old, his life is at a crossroads. Does he apprentice to Qui-Gon Jinn or does he join the AgriCorps. He knows the fate of the galaxy if he chooses the former and so he dedicates himself to the latter. Only, the Force works in mysterious ways. When a third option is presented, becoming Yan Dooku's Padawan, Obi-Wan has to make a decision. With a new master and a new chance, Obi-Wan is determined to save the galaxy from Sidious's plans for it.

Title: Unexpected Awakening (The Rewrite)
Author: Rhiw
Fandom: Star Wars Legends - All Media Types
Summary: Summary: The life of General Kenobi is cut short at the hands of his Padawan, but the sight that greets his eyes upon awakening is not that of blinding light of the Force, but the Jedi Temple he knew when he was still a youth. As he struggles to understand the path laid out before him, Obi-Wan unwittingly captures the attention of a singularly unusual Temple Guard, and that of a reluctant Qui-Gon Jinn.

Title: Jetii'Manda
Author: cjwritesfanficnow
Fandom: Star Wars Legends - All Media Types
Summary: Summary: Obi-Wan bit his lip, his eyes going teary again. â€œI thinkâ€¦ I think staying here is the selfish choice. I think the Force is trying to tell me that there are other people who need me to be a Jetii. â€ Jaster nodded slowly, a plan already forming. â€œWeâ€™ve talked about a lot, and itâ€™s a big decision,â€ he said, squeezing Obi-Wanâ€™s leg once more. â€œWhy donâ€™t you take a few days to think about it?â€ A month later, Jaster found himself on a ship with Ben and a few of his council members, bound for Coruscanta. --- A resurrected Obi-Wan Kenobi finds his way to Mandalore, and the Jedi. A Mandalorian!Obi-Wan fic that will be shameless fluff with a sprinkle of angst. Update: It has now grown a plot. FIX ALL THE THINGS! Slow and inconsistent updates, but not abandoned!

Title: Su Cuy'gar, Vod
Author: Triscribe
Fandom: Star Wars Legends - All Media Types
Summary: Summary: â€œWe have a Jedi too!â€ The kid exclaimed, face lighting up with joy and awe. â€œA really real one from the Core, and he stayed to help even when the older ones left!â€ Codyâ€™s breath caught in his throat. In the corner of his eye, he could see Boilâ€™s hands faintly shaking. (Sometimes, second chances don't need explanations.)

Title: a soul that's born in cold and rain/knows sunlight
Author: Killbothtwins
Fandom: Star Wars Legends - All Media Types
Summary: Summary: Obi-Wan Kenobi, time traveler, finds trouble once again when he and Qui-Gon are called to Mandaloreâ€” but not THAT Mandalore mission. This one involves still pretending to see the future, babies, a slavery ring, and bothering even more people into becoming his friend. As usual, Obi-Wan drags everyone else along for the ride, including some interesting allies.

Title: The Lesson
Author: cjwritesfanficnow
Fandom: Star Wars Legends - All Media Types
Summary: Summary: Jango hadnâ€™t been sure what to expect from being dead. Heâ€™d grown up with stories of Manda, the warriors marching far away, looking over them as they plodded through their lives. But, frankly, he hadnâ€™t expected that to be true. --- This was a lesson. And a test. Remember the lesson. â€œI will,â€ Jango said softly, reaching out to trace a finger over the symbol of the Haat Mandoâ€™ade, still painted proudly on his armor. â€œIâ€™ll remember.â€ --- My take on the time travel trope with Jango Fett as the time traveler, after he's forced to watch the aftermath of all his bad decision making in the afterlife. It's gonna be one hell of a ride. Eventual Jango Fett/Obi-Wan Kenobi relationship. WIP - Will update sporadically. (Not abandoned - Author is at the mercy of the muse.)

Title: (The Force Works In) Mysterious Ways
Author: cjwritesfanficnow
Fandom: Star Wars Legends - All Media Types
Summary: Summary: In the end, he didnâ€™t Fall so much as he sauntered vaguely downward, wading far too deep into the depths of the Darkest pits before he had realized he did not know the way back out of them.   In the morning, Yan would remember little of that vision-dream, and even less of it would make any sense in the recording. But one face would remain clear in his mind, one name tugging at his memory, one clear message from his hurried dictation: Obi-Wan Kenobi. Perhaps he should meet the boy. That might make things clearer.  In which the Force sends Jedi Master Yan Dooku a vision of his own Fall, and its consequences. He may or may not have held on to the wrong message. Alternate title: How the Vision Squad Saves the Galaxy!

Title: Episode ???: A New Hope
Author: Flor_of_Desert
Fandom: Star Wars Legends - All Media Types
Summary: Summary: One chance to fix everything. He could do this. He can do this. Obi-Wan had so many questions and very few answers. Just to get better, heâ€™d have to deal with it cautiously - for now, no one could know whatâ€™d happened to him - and he had to pretend to be an unremarkable Initiate, while he decided which path he would guide the Order to save the galaxy. No pressure. Heâ€™d been once a GAR High General and he was never behind his paperwork. He could do this.

Title: Dha Werda Verda
Author: cjwritesfanficnow
Fandom: Star Wars Legends - All Media Types
Summary: Summary: Obi-Wan couldnâ€™t remember a time when he hadnâ€™t had his Baâ€™ji. He could vaguely remember how he used to only see the man in his dreams, although now, he could hear him even when he was awake. He didnâ€™t see him, as such, when he was awake, but he could feel him nearby, in the Force, and occasionally speaking up, though he spoke to Obi-Wan alone. â€œYou are a Jetii, Obi-Wan. You must cease speaking in the past tense,â€ Baâ€™ji sighed. â€œAnd you were a Jetii of the Order.â€ And what other kind of Jedi is there? Obi-Wan sighed back, and he stopped pacing, suddenly freezing, as he finally understood what Baâ€™ji was trying to do. A Jetiiâ€™Manda. You want me to go with them. â€œAnd now you see,â€ Baâ€™ji said. --- You all asked, and I eventually (sort of) delivered! This is an expansion from chapters 4-6 of my one-shot collection. Update: Not abandoned - Author is at the mercy of the muse.

Title: Back From the Future: Episode VI The Clone Wars
Author: Ariel_Sojourner
Summary: Summary: In which Luke Skywalker and Darth Vader travel back in time together to the Clone Wars era, have amazing adventures, and save the galaxy.

Title: Of Queens, Knights, and Pawns
Author: chancecraz
Summary: Summary: I went to sleep on the worst day of my life and woke to find myself in the past on the second worst day of my life. As experiences go, I donâ€™t recommend it.

Title: Reprise I
Author: Elfpen
Summary: Summary: Ben Kenobi dies aboard the Death Star in the year 0 BBY. He wakes up shortly thereafter in the Jedi temple in the year 41 BBY. Haunted by memories and regret, Ben must forge a new path for himself in the Jedi Order of his youth while navigating the murky waters of time travel. Crafting a better future from bitter experience is hard, but learning to heal is even harder. Major AU.

Title: Luminous
Author: HopeofDawn
Summary: Summary: "If you strike me down, I shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine." ****  â€œ70 â€¦â€ 68 said slowly, taken off-guard. 70 wasnâ€™t a brother normally inclined towards ghost-tales. â€œBen isnâ€™t real. Heâ€™s just a baby story--something the tubies like to pretend is real.â€ 70 shook his head, his face set in stubborn lines. â€œHe might not be. No, listen--â€ he gave 74 a glare when it looked like his brother wanted to interrupt again. â€œIâ€™ve heard the stories, and theyâ€™re always the same. The tubies all know what he looks like. They all know heâ€™s a jetii, before anyone ever told them what a jetii was. You know how the longnecks keep batches of tubies separate. Thereâ€™s no way any of us, or any of the older vod, could have told them about him. But it doesnâ€™t matter. All the batches know about Ben.â€

Title: wonderterror
Author: peradi
Summary: Summary: Anakin Skywalker is the son of the Force. Heâ€™s half human and half something monumental. What does that make his children? -- The Skywalkers aren't entirely human. Here's what that means.

Title: Tuning up your TIE-Fighter to prove youâ€™re better than the bastard currently running the TIE-Fighter Program for fun and profit
Author: loosingletters
Summary: Summary: As a rule, Vader didn't really do anything with his social media account, but then the rant of some kid from Tatooine about the inefficiency of TIE Fighters began trending, the pilots and engineers on the Devastator started fixing their ships and Vader got invested.   â€œWelcome to another episode of Scrap Hunting,â€ the teenager in the video said. He took a sip of water from the metallic canteen he was holding, drinking slow and carefully the way only a desert dweller did. â€œA couple weeks ago some sleemo commented that Iâ€™d never be able to improve any Imperial ships since Iâ€™m just Outer Rim trash. And I suppose you did have a point that the things I fix wonâ€™t ever reach the level of an Imperial TIE because I wouldnâ€™t build such trash in the first place.â€

Title: Apology Accepted
Author: Fialleril
Summary: Summary: What really happened to Captain Needa.

Title: PRojects IN Controlled Environments, version Sith
Author: Beth Winter (BethWinter)
Summary: Summary: The overworked project manager on the redesign of the Imperial Lambda-class shuttle gets surprisingly competent feedback from an unknown official on Coruscant. She promptly decides that anyone bored enough to do a technical review of their own free will should be found proper employment for their own good. Her correspondent has been missing the opportunity to tinker with machinery. It gives him something to do between hunting down rebels.

Title: Duty Bound
Author: acuteneurosis
Summary: Summary: What goes up must come down. And rise and fall and rise and fall, again and again. Leia's not sure if she's up yet or still in the middle of a down, but it's terrifying to realize how far she has left to fall. And who she'll bring with her.

Title: The Tinies
Author: SilverDaye
Summary: Summary: [Comic Series] After discovering his wife is alive, Darth Vader is suddenly thrown into fatherhood of two young tiny children.

Title: Magic Blankets
Author: Lady_Lombax
Summary: Summary: C-3PO accidentally saves the galaxy by teaching a young Ani Skywalker how to crochet. Or in which the power of love and crafts solve a lot of problems and the Jedi Creche is about two inches away from kidnapping Anakin at any given moment.

Title: Supreme Chancellor Obi-Wan Kenobi
Author: stonefreeak
Summary: Summary: By an old Republic law, all members of the Jedi High Council are senators in the Galactic Senate, and can thus be voted in as chancellor. A Senator from a less prominent planet has had enough of Chancellor Palpatine's incompetence and calls for a Vote of No-Confidence and the installation of Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi as Supreme Chancellor of the Galactic Republic. This one action becomes the catalyst that changes the direction of the galaxy. or â€œObi-Wanâ€™s Life Gets Worse (Though Itâ€™s Not As Bad As It Couldâ€™ve Been)â€.

Title: Back From the Future: Episode VI The Clone Wars
Author: Ariel_Sojourner
Summary: Summary: In which Luke Skywalker and Darth Vader travel back in time together to the Clone Wars era, have amazing adventures, and save the galaxy.

Title: there but for the grace of god
Author: wanderlove
Summary: Summary: Thereâ€™s nothing particularly remarkable about Sullust. Well, except for Obi-Wanâ€™s time-traveling son. But, you know. Apart from that. Or, baby-Luke-raised-by-Ben-Kenobi shows up in the middle of the Clone Wars, causes Anakin and Obi-Wan to put two and two together and get forty-five, and in the process inspires a series of heartfelt conversations that may or may not avert the terrible future heâ€™s from.

Title: The Way of Conquest
Author: pagination
Summary: Summary: All Din wanted to do was find the Child a sorcerer teacher, pick up a job or two, and follow his Creed. Three out of three is good, right? Right?

Title: Master Mine
Author: skyl_tales
Summary: Summary: "What is the last thing you remember?" Obi-Wan pursed his lips. "I was packing my belongings to prepare for my trip to the AgriCorps." The Healer nodded, looking unsurprised but unhappy. "You are not thirteen, Obi-Wan," she said. "Yesterday, you were a thirty-eight-year-old Jedi Master and Council member. Unfortunately, there was something of an accident during your last mission."

Title: The Legend Of Liob
Author: Killbothtwins
Summary: Summary: The Republic sends a combat photographer to be attached to the 212th until further notice, citing the need for a morale boost. The clones make up a fake clone, citing the absolute fact that it is very funny. Somehow, these two things save the galaxy.

Title: wicked thing
Author: imaginarykat
Summary: Summary: There are rumours of yet another Sith Lord hiding among the Separatists. The Council sends Anakin to investigate. Anakin has a bad feeling about this. or, the story of how Anakin exists in a perpetual state of intense embarrassment, Kenobi is enjoying it a little too much, and everything is, generally speaking, a gigantic mess.

Title: Hourglass
Author: BeanieBaby
Summary: Summary: â€œAre you an angel?â€ Anakinâ€™s small hands came up to cup his smooth cheeks, blue eyes wide with wonder. â€œNo, Ani,â€ Blinking past the moisture threatening to flood his eyes, Obi-Wan laughed and in a wild moment of poor decision-making, pressed a loving kiss to Anakinâ€™s forehead. But I swear I will watch over you like one if the Force gave me a second chance hummed unspoken between their new bond. (Obi-Wan finds himself back on Tatooine after his encounter with Darth Vader in the Death Star. Qui-Gon lives and becomes Anakin's master. Some things change and others do not. Time-travel Fix-it.)

Title: walk by faith/tell no one what you've seen
Author: Killbothtwins
Summary: Summary: After the end of the war with the Empire, Obi-Wan wakes up in his twelve-year old body. Now all he needs to do is convince everyone he's psychic, trick his Master into taking him on before he's sent to Bandomeer, redeem a few bad guys, and try not to have a nervous breakdown. Pretty easy. It's not like the Sith are lurking on the horizon, waiting to devour the Jedi Order.

Title: Old Man Luke

Fandom: Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008) - All Media Types
Summary: Summary: Obi-Wan narrowed his eyes. "Who are you?" He asked, hoping a direct question would yield answers. The old man seemed adept at side-stepping information when asked a bit more deftly. â€œIâ€™ve never heard of a Master with your level of talent.â€      The old man seemed surprised. â€œIf youâ€™ve never heard of one like me, then what good would my name be? You wouldnâ€™t know it.â€   Obi-Wan felt a flare of irritation, and quickly squashed it. The old man blinked, as if he hadnâ€™t expected to feel that, and he smiled, sadly. â€œMy name is Luke,â€ he said, as if a peace offering.   The force trilled in his ear, and Obi-Wan frowned. "Luke what?" He asked, and the old man, this Luke, smiled wryly.   "Luke Skywalker.â€

Title: The Boyfriend
Author: AverageFish
Summary: Summary: "I like the trees here," Harry said, his accent placing him far from home. "They keep my wrackspurts away." It was twilight, and he wasn't wearing any shoes. "You can stay at my place," Charlie said.  One night turned into teaching Harry to use the coffee machine, and then he grew used to fresh pancakes every Sunday. Until Charlie realized one day, while calling Harry down from the old oak out back, that he didn't want the man to leave.  A medley of FalconLux's The Boyfriend, hctiB-notsoB's I See The Moon, and The_Carnivorous_Muffin's Painting Red Madonnas.

Title: Don't think about it and it will go away on its own
Author: Gimlili
Summary: Summary: He didn't want to be Harry Potter anymore. There was nothing left for him in the wizarding world so he was starting over. Harry Black, a 17-year-old muggle with too much time on his hands, moves to the only place where he might still have family. Forks, Washington, seems like the perfect place to start over and carve out a new place for himself but he's not the only immortal teenager in town and ignoring the problem doesn't seem to be making it go away. He didn't need to get involved with every supernatural mystery, and really, was it any of his business if his new cousin's eyes glowed amber sometimes? It certainly wasn't any of his business that a coven of vampires were pretending to be teenagers at his school. Harry is determined to ignore what's happening and instead focus on his hatred of Charles Dickens, Chemistry homework and Mike Newton. But the supernatural element of his new high school can't seem to leave him alone and Harry has always been really bad at staying out of things. ---- Follow my Tumblr for updates on this fic and everything else I'm working on!

Title: The Boyfriend
Author: FalconLux
Summary: Summary: When Bella Moved to Forks to live with her dad, the last thing she could have expected was to find out that her dad had a young, gorgeous boyfriend! Just a short little ficlet. Will not be continued.

Follow her as she navigates this deadly universe, can she change things for the better? Or will her selfish need to have her own way make it worse? Can she save the people she loves or are they fated to die? And how did she even get to this universe in the first place?

Or is the twisted poison that flows through her veins determined to shatter any chance of a better life? An alternate take on the Act III finale and Jinx's journey to find a place where she belongs.

Title: you carry my fears (as the heavens set fire)
Author: prettyaveragewhiteshark
Summary: Summary: In which Vi and Caitlyn have sex four different times OR The author is working through touch trauma with an incredible partner and wanted to let Vi in on that action too

Title: Plus One
Author: wiseturtlebear
Summary: Summary: After an impromptu conversation with Caitlyn's parents, Vi finds herself accompanying Caitlyn to her winter-home in Holdrum for a whole week. It's the first time Vi has ever been outside the city gates, the trip is fully-paid for and she'll get to be with Caitlyn the whole time. The problem? They have to pretend that they're dating and hopelessly in love with each other the whole time. For Vi, she won't really have to pretend.

Title: A New Era
Author: spicedrobot
Summary: Summary: They toast. They toast again. To Piltover. To their partnership. To their dream. Viktor idly wonders how long theyâ€™ve been sitting so close, how long heâ€™s been smiling, watching Jayce drink and talk, how easily he could get used to this.

Title: the perfect ache
Author: Amandosh
Summary: Summary: Caitlyn's soulmate has the ability to take up all the air inside her chest. Her senses never forget. aka: The Soulmate AU where they can feel the otherâ€™s pain.

Title: The Threads Of Fate Tangle And Twist
Author: Misthios
Summary: Summary: â€œAbout that,â€ Vi says. â€œHowâ€™d you end up here? What did a girl like you do to get tossed into this two-star shithole?â€   â€œReally? Thatâ€™s how you ask? No subtlety in it?â€   â€œUh, yeah? I saved you from getting shanked in the shower, so fairâ€™s fair. Whatâ€™s your deal, topside?â€   â€œCaitlyn,â€ she says. That isnâ€™t right. That wasnâ€™t the answer Vi was after. Names are easily given away but so seldomly remembered in Stillwater, but it echoes in Viâ€™s head. She almost doesnâ€™t hear the actual answer. â€œAnd though I have no doubt a thousand people have given this answer before, I did nothing. I was doing my job, and then I was here. No trial. No sentencing. No crime to speak of.â€  * Half a decade into Vi's stay in Stillwater, a topsider turns up, raving about being a Councillor's daughter.

Title: Rumours (Terrible and True)
Author: SunsetSharkbite
Summary: Summary: â€œIâ€™m always amazed at how youâ€™re not kidnapped or dead in a ditch. Your luck is almost annoying.â€ â€œWhat can I say?â€ Vi grinned with that casual leaning shrug. â€œGod is a woman, and She thinks Iâ€™m hot.â€  Vi and Cait are coworkers on the second season of their hit show. Their characters onscreen have great chemistry and are popular with fans, but the actors themselves? Barely get along. Until they have to.

Title: insinuations
Author: aevallare
Summary: Summary: Jayce very nearly chokes. â€œI had thought youâ€™d be too busy for gossip.â€ â€œJust because I go out of my way not to be noticed doesnâ€™t mean that I donâ€™t have ears,â€ Viktor says dryly. - people are going to talk either way.

Title: the heart's epiphany
Author: cityseeker
Summary: Summary: â€œNo,â€ Caitlyn whispers, shoulders slipping. Oh, sheâ€™s not strong enough for this. â€œNo, no- you- why you? Why you?â€ She still smells the way she did two years agoâ€” standing at their doorstep, packing her bags, saying we shouldnâ€™t have done this. I shouldnâ€™t have done this. â€œWhy me,â€ Vi repeats. â€œIsnâ€™t that the fucking question.â€ or: they're exes, they're still in love, and they're pretty sure fate just fucking hates them

Title: Eye for an Eye
Author: LazyDaizy
Summary: Summary: Young women are disappearing in New York and when the sister of Jughead Jones, (King of the Serpents and notoriously well known in the world of heists as The Shadow Thief) is taken and left for dead, revenge becomes his primary focus. When an FBI agent clues him in on who is possibly behind the disappearances, and he finds out the man has a sister, Jughead makes a move that starts a war with deadly consequences. Sister for sister, Jughead doesnâ€™t realize the value this slip of a woman with golden hair and green eyes has and just what her brother is willing to sacrifice to get her back.

Title: this is the last time, I'll say a million more times
Author: underneaththewalnuttree
Summary: Summary: Veronica has made what she acknowledges is considerable progress in her mission of becoming an objectively good person. But what Cheryl isâ€”mean, contemptuous, hyper-criticalâ€”is what Veronica used to be. And when sheâ€™s prompted to defend herself against some demeaning allegation, lapsing back is really, really easy. Cheryl smiles, much too casually, and begins. â€œAs a firsthand witness to your ill-advised, gratuitous lip-lock with Betty Cooper at the Vixen tryouts, I assume you have no qualms about kissing girls?â€ Veronica lapses back. Because itâ€™s easy. â€œNo qualms about kissing girls,â€ she responds with a shrug. â€œMany qualms about kissing the winner of hellâ€™s Jessica Rabbit look-alike contest.â€ - Or, three times Veronica spins the bottle. And Betty's reaction each time.

Title: Tony's Little Black Book (Night in Front of the TV)
Author: hellbells
Summary: Summary: Tony DiNozzo's Black Book is ever full. These are just a few names of who might be in there.

Title: This Rage is the One Thing I Get from my Father
Author: keeping_up_with_the_morningstars
Summary: Summary: With a sharp exhale, he got up from his seat and walked over to the bar, Sabrinaâ€™s eyes following him with a silent incredulity all the while. He continued his story even as he fixed himself a stronger drink than he would have liked. â€œA small favor, come to think of it. He asked for a child. He and Diana were trying for years, but no spell or potion could give them what they wanted. I thought it simple enough. I mean, Father sent my brothers to bless humans with children all the time." His face soured as he emptied the glass in one gulp. â€œIt wasnâ€™t like that, though.â€ He had a grim look to him as he sank back down to his seat across from her. â€œI soon realized that I didnâ€™t have the same gifts as Amenadiel. I couldnâ€™t channel the divine light of life the way he could. Butâ€¦Edward was relentless, and I was, too. After all, the Devil never left a favor ungranted. So in the end, I did give him a child.â€ Sabrina held her breath as the next words were softly uttered from his mouth. â€œI gave him mine.â€ In which Sabrina Spellman goes to L.A. to escape Greendale's witches and demons and magic, only to end up with a devilish father, angelic uncle, and very confused detective in the process.

Title: i just want you to know who i am
Author: cheryltonis
Summary: Summary: it's hard enough being a teenager in 1995. but to cheryl blossom, nothing is harder than being the pastor's daughter with a secret crush on toni topaz, riverdale high's resident hbic.

Title: (my youth ain't) tangled up in bad decisions
Author: singsongsung
Summary: Summary: There is a Fleetwood Mac album playing on Jughead's record player. Won't you lay me down in the tall grass. Betty is hyper-aware of every single part of her body, from her toenails to her eyelashes. -- Tired of fitting herself into uncomfortable moulds, Betty trades Jughead a milkshake in exchange for a very personal favour.

Title: Scars
Author: IndianSummer13
Summary: Summary: When rising photographer Jughead Jones scores a photo shoot with model-of-the-moment Betty Cooper, he expects to use it, simply, to help his career take off. What he doesn't expect, is to be so enraptured with her beauty. Or for the single shoot to turn into a series of stunning portraits, Or to witness the marks on her palms grow into burns across her skin. . What he doesnâ€™t expect either, is to be her salvation.

Title: Scuff
Author: WhoLenny
Summary: Summary: Cheryl Blossom had had two scuffs mar her young life thus far. The first, had been her shoe at 6 years old, scuffed by defying her mother's orders and strict social convention. The second, had been the beautiful, and tragically fast-removed, Heather scuffed by a first-love and sexual deviance. So, here she sat, as she gazed innocuously upon the pink-hair cascading in waves down a slender back and the gleaming eyes of a serpent peering up at her from the back of her jacket. Toni Topaz. A serpent. A vixen. And, Cheryl thought with a dizzying elation she hadnâ€™t felt in years, a brand new scuff on her life.

Title: The Real Suspension of Disbelief

AU: Jughead Jones is a Southside High student and, therefore, doesnâ€™t know any of the regular Riverdale High students.

Title: Black Robe

Summary: Summary: In which Monteriggioni has a significant vacancy and Desmond's timing is almost divine.

Title: Flowers For a Planet

Summary: Summary: There are flowers growing in the Grey.

Summary: Summary: In which generals Skywalker and Kenobi investigate an Ancient Sith Temple and Desmond Miles isn't really a Sith, promise. ABANDONED WORK TO BE DELETED

Summary: Summary: In which Desmond ends up back in time and doesn't so much decide to use it to deal with some hangups he had about Ezio's life as much as sort of... falls into doing it because of bitterness and spite and some very questionable medicine.

Summary: Summary: She texts Bolin: Good news: Asami isnâ€™t a ghost that eats my ramen noodles.

Title: Harry Potter and the Avatar's Return

Podfic and translations in French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Russian, and Spanish now available! See chapter one author notes for links.

Author: WitchofEndor
Summary: Summary: When Azula is nine, she becomes an only child. She hears the Fire Lord call for Zuko's life, and in the morning, her mother and brother are gone. Azula may be young, but she isn't naive. She knows what happened to them. Which makes it all the more surprising when Azula tracks the Avatar down and fights his group of peasant friends, only to find herself staring into an eerily familiar face.

Title: Fractures
Author: EvieNyx
Summary: Summary: Zuko realizes his destiny much earlier. As in, as soon as he wakes up in the palace after his Agni Kai and is told he is banished. Unfortunately, he's never been a patient one. So he storms right up to Ozai and tells him what he's going to do. And gets locked up for over three years. Then, one day, he's being pulled out and told he's the new Fire Lord. A "Zuko never meets the Gaang and suddenly becomes Fire Lord after three years of literal torture" AU. In which the Gaang doesn't know what to think of the new Fire Lord who happens to be the missing nephew of Aang's firebending teacher, Iroh constantly has a headache, and, sure, maybe the world hates the Fire Nation, but the Fire Nation LOVES Zuko, and he can work with that.

Title: the beginning of a new and brighter birth
Author: aloneintherain
Summary: Summary: â€œIâ€™m so proud of you, my nephew.â€ Uncle cups Zukoâ€™s face in his lined hand. The gesture is so tender, his palm so warm, that Zuko has to take a fortifying breath against the sudden swell of emotion in his chest. â€œI want to be a good leader, Uncle,â€ Zuko says. â€œI want to look after my people.â€ â€œYou will,â€ Uncle says. â€œYou are, nephew.â€  In a new era of peace, Zuko works to be a very different Fire Lord than his forefathers. Based on this tumblr post.

Title: The Good Vanilla
Author: Haicrescendo
Summary: Summary: Sokkaâ€™s beautiful friendship with Zuko doesnâ€™t start with breaking Dad out of jail. Thatâ€™s just what he tells people. Sokkaâ€™s beautiful friendship with Zuko started the day he realizes that he knows how to cook. Feat. breakup cake, an attempted assassination, and eating out of the pan like dirty heathens.

Title: love language
Author: aloneintherain
Summary: Summary: They gravitated towards Zuko whenever the temperature dipped even slightly. At night, he often woke to someone pulling their bedroll towards him, or slipping under his arm, or turning over in their sleep and colliding with his shoulder. It alarmed him, at first. It had never been a good thing when someone woke him in the dead of the night. It was strange, then, that he was on the run without Uncle, officially a traitor to his homeland, and for the first time since his mother left, he woke in the night sandwiched between bodies, feeling safe.  (Zuko becomes the group's heat-pack.)

Title: half in the shadows, half burned in flames
Author: r_astra
Summary: Summary: â€œThey say you tried to kill the Firelord,â€ Hakoda says. "Why?" Zuko doesnâ€™t know how to answer. Because I hate him. Because I love him. Because he wants to see the world burn. Because he knotted one hand in my hair and cupped flames against my face with the other. Because my mother is dead. Because my uncle is dead. Instead, he shrugs tiredly and says: â€œSomeone has to.â€

Title: Mountains and Badgermolehills
Author: Glass_Onion
Summary: Summary: After the Blue Spirit frees the Avatar from the Pohuai Stronghold, Admiral Zhao captures Prince Zuko under suspicion of treason. Isolated from his Uncle and his crew, Zuko has only one ally: the chatty prisoner one cell over.

Title: Dark Matter
Author: mysterycyclone
Summary: Summary: The last thing Peter sees is Tony's horrified, heartbroken expression leaning over him. The guilt in his eyes is almost worse than the burning pain that's taking Peter apart piece by piece. The world starts to go dark. There's a flash of gold and green. For one moment, he finds himself standing amongst the Guardians and others. And then darkness again. It feels like blinking; an extended period of nothingness that ends as abruptly as it begins. One moment thereâ€™s nothing, the next thereâ€™s light. â€œEasy,â€ a woman says. Her words are gentle, and carry a slight accent that he canâ€™t place. "I'm called Wonder Woman. What's your name?"

Title: Batcellanea
Author: envysparkler
Summary: Summary: A collection of outtakes, alternate POVs, and missing scenes from my existing work. 188-221. whumptober fills.

Title: the bat's nest
Author: helenabertinellis
Summary: Summary: The Justice League knew that Batman didn't trust anyone; they also knew that they were probably the closest he got. Aside from them, Batman worked alone. At least... they thought they knew that. Then they met his kids.

Title: Take Care of Business
Author: TheResurrectionist
Summary: Summary: Summary: Bruce has a conference call with Wayne Enterprises. Having it at the Manor was, in hindsight, a really shitty idea. â€œI donâ€™t have your phone!â€ The two boys began trading hits, yelling at the top of their lungs. Bruce turned back to the webcam just as Damian leapt on top of Timâ€™s back, a high-pitched battle cry torn from his lips. â€œMr. Hodges,â€ he said cheerfully, unflinching as Tim threw Damian into the wet bar sink. â€œHave you had a chance to examine the chart I pointed out?â€ Inspired by this viral video and Batwaynemanâ€™s post on tumblr.

Title: Bus to Nowhere
Author: foldingfacets
Summary: Summary: Is it running from your problems if your problems consider you to be a dead imprint of consciousness that killed their son? Yes, but Danny tries not to think about how his nightmares of his parents trying to kill him came true when they found out he was Phantom. After being on the run from his parents and the government for a couple of months, moving from town to town, Danny ends up in Gotham City and decides to risk staying in Batman's territory. He'd take the wrath of Batman over live vivisection via beloved parents or being studied and torn apart by the government. Besides, he's not a meta. Being dead is a medical condition.

Title: Watch This
Author: snackbaskets
Summary: Summary: Hal and Barry are worried about Batman's new partner. Being around the Batman all the time can't be good for a kid, right? Robin insists otherwise, and for $15.36 of betting money, is happy to demonstrate.

Title: Vertical Limit
Author: hppjmxrgosg
Summary: Summary: Danny Fenton is not okay. TM. Honestly? Just overall bad vibes. But he's doing his best. Making it work. And trying not to become fully dead in the process. The Justice League is very concerned. But it's actually their fault they got involved so take that one, Batman. John Constantine told them not to do the thing. They did it anyway.  Or, Danny gets summoned by the League, and he actually kind of adopts them in the process. Because these big city heroes don't know anything about ghosts and who is he if he doesn't help them out? Besides, the Watchtower is in space. Danny's always wanted to go to space...  (I'm not really following any specific JL timeline, so like. Be prepared for 98% of everything to be *made up* and possibly *not real*.) Podfic available by ChaosKiro, linked under works inspired by this one at the very end of this work!

Title: 5 Times Tim Spends the Night at Wayne Manor + 1 Time He Comes Home
Author: motleyfam
Summary: Summary: Tim is good at galas. No, scratch thatâ€”Tim is great at galas. Heâ€™s been attending them ever since the age of three, when his parents first stuffed him into his little Gymboree tuxedo and gave him a stern lecture about â€˜sitting quietlyâ€™ and â€˜speaking when spoken to.â€™ He knows all the rules: what to wear, how to stand, when to smile, what to say, what not to say. He knows how to come across as polite and intelligent and charming, and on absolutely any other day, he would be rocking this. --- Or, my take on a â€˜Tim Joins the Family Earlyâ€™ AU, told through a series of sleepoversâ€”most of which are unplanned. Featuring pre-teen Tim, Alive!Jason, and a whole lot of hurt/comfort.

Alfred and Jason disagree, and get Dick and Bruce involved in figuring out their weird nextdoor neighbor kidâ€™s life. Everything goes uphill from there.

Thereâ€™s not much he can do but watch (Titans Tower AU).

Title: Monolith
Author: CharlesWaterloo
Summary: Summary: Diana realised with a jolt that none of them had actually asked him how he knew Batman. And she was just as curious as the rest of them about the â€œweâ€. It implied Batman worked with more people. â€˜How did you come to know Batman? Does he have any other friends?â€™ His mouth fell open, and he snorted, which evolved into full-out laughter. â€˜Iâ€™m sorry. Oh my god - friends?â€™ Diana felt a little hurt on Batmanâ€™s behalf. â€˜Are you not his friend?' He shook his head. â€˜Did B really not say anything? Iâ€™m hurt. No, Iâ€™m not his friend. Iâ€™m his son.â€™ (An AU where the Justice League haven't met any of Bruce's kids.)

Title: Banshee In A Well
Author: liverobinreaction (bugbee)
Summary: Summary: Tim is five years old when he drowns in his parents' pool. He dies quietly, waiting for parents who love him, but will never be there, to realise that something is wrong. They never show up, and he sinks into oblivion. When he wakes up and claws his way out of the water, the sun has set, and the lights of his house are on. He is cold and wet and his lungs burn. But most of all, Tim is alone. (If you die and no-one is there to see it, were you ever alive in the first place?)

Until then, no capes.")

Title: Worldâ€™s Saddest Breakfast Club
Author: motleyfam
Summary: Summary: Following a couple of Very Bad Weeksâ„¢ (which may or may not have involved being kidnapped and mildly tortured), Jason decides the best way to cheer himself up is to break into the Manor for a 3 a.m. snack. Turns out he isnâ€™t the only one awake.

Title: Mistake on the Part of Nature

"Bucky found out about bananas."  In which an American icon is mourned. But probably not the one you're thinking of.

Title: Astronomy In Reverse
Author: pansley
Summary: Summary: A year after the Winter Soldier failed his mission in DC, Bucky Barnes is doing his best to stay under the radar from both Hydra and Steve Rogers. His hope for a peaceful day-to-day life in limbo goes awry, however, when he meets Queensâ€™ newest hero; a pure-hearted kid with a death wish and a ridiculous pair of red and blue pajamas. The last thing Steve expects when he finally tracks Bucky down is that, not only has the man been living in Queens all this time, right under his nose, but also that, in the two years since they last saw each other, Bucky somehow acquired a kid. Alternatively: How Peter Parker effectively fucks over Bucky Barnes, and also totally saves him.   Fanart by Monireh on AO3 and tumblr

Title: The Twice-Told Tale
Author: arysteia
Summary: Summary: For someone he'd hero-worshipped for so long, Steve Rogers in the flesh is a pretty big disappointment. For one thing, he keeps looking at Tony as though he reminds him of someone else, and even if he never says anything, Tony's pretty sure it's his father. A lifetime of not measuring up to Howard's expectations is more than enough, thank you very much, and he's certainly not going to make an effort to live up to any of Steve's. Steve's pretty clearly failed to live up to his expectations, in any case, and that's not hypocritical at all.

Title: Slide To Answer
Author: relenafanel
Summary: Summary: "What do I do?â€ Steve appealed into the phone. â€œIâ€™m freaking out.â€ There was silence on the other end of the line. It lasted so long that Steve pulled the receiver away from his ear and frowned at it. Pay phones were old. Maybe this one wasnâ€™t working despite the obvious dial tone when he picked up. â€œOk,â€ a strangerâ€™s voice said over the phone. â€œFirst acknowledge the fact that you dialed the wrong number, but be quick about it because my cab is a few blocks away from my own plans and Iâ€™m about to drop some truth bombs on you.â€

Title: Peter Parker's Home for the Wayward Villain
Author: BeanieBaby
Summary: Summary: A really long redemption story.

Title: This, You Protect
Author: owlet
Summary: Summary: The mission resets abruptly, from objective: kill to objective: protect

Summary: Summary: Is it running from your problems if your problems consider you to be a dead imprint of consciousness that killed their son? He'd take the wrath of Batman over live vivisection via beloved parents or being studied and torn apart by the government. Besides, he's not a meta. Being dead is a medical condition.

Or, Danny gets summoned by the League, and he actually kind of adopts them in the process. Because these big city heroes don't know anything about ghosts and who is he if he doesn't help them out? Besides, the Watchtower is in space. Danny's always wanted to go to space...  (I'm not really following any specific JL timeline, so like. Be prepared for 98% of everything to be *made up* and possibly *not real*.) Podfic available by ChaosKiro, linked under works inspired by this one at the very end of this work!

But Tony isn't ready trust, neither is his new protegee Spiderman. The fractured team can't seem to come together. It's a good thing then that Danny Phantom is ready to save the day. That doesn't mean anyone is prepared for when he keeps showing up. NOW COMPLETE!

Title: I Just Wanna Talk
Author: foldingfacets
Summary: Summary: John Constantine beat the system of life and death until it fully refused to touch him anymore, and when it did, it never went well. It was a fact that the League had come to terms with, or those that knew, anyways. None of Constantineâ€™s past could explain the kid in fuzzy pajamas that was curled up on a chair in the Justice Leagueâ€™s control room asking for the elusive brit. Danny had barely made it to high school graduation only to be thrust into dealing with the millennia of bullshit waiting ever so patiently for the King of the Infinite Realms to look at. The fact that there was a weird amount of paperwork filed regarding some dude named John Constantine that looked like the weirdest form of tax fraud heâ€™d ever seen was puzzling, and his parents committed that regularly. He has no idea what the hell heâ€™s looking at. Alternately: Danny is the inter-dimensional personification of the IRS for Death and the Unliving, and he just has a couple questions.

Title: Robin's Egg

Summary: Summary: While out on nightly patrol, Robin finds a very injured Danny Phantom who is about to be forced back into his core. Summary: Summary: When Captain Marvel sends out a distress call, the only League member available is Batman. Bruce comes to his aid, but he finds out that Billy is a 10-year-old homeless orphan with black hair and blue eyes. Obviously, he makes the only logical decision and adopts Billy. Because it's Bruceâ€”who's allergic to revealing life-changing informationâ€”the League is left in the dark. This story is written as 5+1 story from the Justice League's POV as they attempt to define the weird relationship between Batman and Captain Marvel. 5 times they didn't realize Batman had adopted Captain Marvel, and the 1 time they did.

Title: Loading and Aspect Ratio
Author: JUBE514
Summary: Summary: So, it didnâ€™t start out like this.  Alfred would scoff at the statement, about how Bruce was trying to justify the whole situation to himself. It had started out as a simple design, black everything with black outlines and black hood. It got a little more intense as the world went on, got wind of his ghost on the streets, and became scared of The Bat . So Bruce got a little more creative with it, Alfred and him had a good laugh over the name, the scare, and Alfred had a vicious streak of humor that he had passed onto his ward-  So now the suit had a visible bat-theme, an insignia to drape in the shadows and to paint across the streets of Gotham.  It only took a year into the whole charade of heroism for Bruce to overhear a conversation between some goons- some low level thug hired by the Riddler this week- about nothing at all pertaining to what the hell the Riddler was doing in the sewers but instead: â€œ The Batman can fly, you know, Iâ€™ve seen his wings.â€ -- A world where nobody has wings, but people think they do, and that changes everything.

Title: tell all the truth (but tell it slant)
Author: susiecarter
Summary: Summary: It takes a while for Batman and Superman to work things out, once Clark comes back from the dead. Pretending to date each other in order to explain why Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent are in the same place so often? Doesn't help as much as you might think. Written as a fill for the dceu_kinkmeme prompt, summarized: Bruce/Clark, fake dating. (Full prompt in author's notes.)

Title: Meeting the Batfamily

Summary: Summary: The Batfamily meets the Justice League- and they are not impressed.

Title: Not so Alone

Bruce decides to do the only reasonable thing: go on vacation. His children probably won't burn down anything too important. Dick just wants to defend his family and brag about his siblings. Title: Butler Spider
Author: Danny_shells
Summary: Summary: Just before the battle with Thanos, Dr Strange pulls together enough power to send one person to a different dimension. A chance for that person to be safe from the destruction that Thanos was about to wrought on Earth. The group about to fight agreed that Peter Parker, for sheer virtual of being the only person not an adult there, would get the dubious honor. Which is how Peter finds himself waking up in Gotham City, a place even crueler and darker than New York City. Peter has to try to find a way to fit into this new universe at just sixteen years old. "I am still just your butler, and I cannot simply tell you that you will be adopting a new son. But I truly am not getting younger. You have seven children now, even if you havenâ€™t adopted all of them legally. There is much more work than when it was just you and I. There is perhaps too much work for just myself, and then providence dropped a starving young man into my pathway for me to mold into a new generation of caretaker,â€ Alfred tried to explain himself. Or Alfred finds himself doing the adopting instead of Bruce, this time of a spider. Can Spider-Man become a first rate butler and keep his secret identity?

Title: Dark Matter
Author: mysterycyclone
Summary: Summary: The last thing Peter sees is Tony's horrified, heartbroken expression leaning over him. The guilt in his eyes is almost worse than the burning pain that's taking Peter apart piece by piece. The world starts to go dark. There's a flash of gold and green. For one moment, he finds himself standing amongst the Guardians and others. And then darkness again. It feels like blinking; an extended period of nothingness that ends as abruptly as it begins. One moment thereâ€™s nothing, the next thereâ€™s light. â€œEasy,â€ a woman says. Her words are gentle, and carry a slight accent that he canâ€™t place. "I'm called Wonder Woman. What's your name?"

Peter focuses on controlling his breathing, fear twisting awfully in his belly. â€œYou may look down on me, Mr. Spider-Man, but for all the righteous suffering I inflict, Iâ€™ve never hurt a child. "Are you kidding me?" he eventually gasped. "How OLD are you? Twelve?â€œ

Title: baby, iâ€™d victoria your secret anytime

Summary: Summary: Peterâ€™s known Wade for a while now, so he can maybe see how this makes sense -- like, maybe Wade has a thing about going commando and just happened to have an old girlfriendâ€™s panties lying around, one thing led to anotherâ€¦butâ€¦    â€œAnd the bra?â€ Peter croaks.

Title: Sick Days

Title: Extended Family is Still Family

What if she started to withdraw, to stay away so that she didn't ruin anything else? What if someone noticed and decided to do something about it? Pepa had missed the signs that led to her brother leaving them. She refused to see the same happen to Mirabel.

Title: The Mouse in the Walls
Author: UC_Glue
Summary: Summary: Her entire life, Mirabel has felt like the odd one out of the Madrigal family. No gift, no talent, no miracle.... No one could possibly comprehend what it is like to be her. So then why does the mysterious man living in the walls understand her better than her family can? [An AU in which Mirabel discovers Bruno before the magic disappears, but has no idea who he is.]

Title: The Door No One Knocks On
Author: BeautyIsInTheBookshelves
Summary: Summary: After never receiving a gift like all of her siblings and cousins, Mirabel has tried her best to make the best of her life being normal. She's still a Madrigal. No matter how much her Abuela pushes her away. No matter how much her cousins look down on her. No matter how much Luisa ignores her. No matter how much Isabela scolds and bullies her. As the years pass, it's almost like she's invisible in her own home. Hidden away behind the nursey door, no one except her parents wondered if she was okay. And even then, them being shooed away because "she'll be okay". As the years pass, it's like no one knows she's there anymore. And so, Mirabel decides for the better of her family and the Encanto to just go and stop being in the way. (Mirabel runs away from the Encanto after being mistreated since her ceremony)
