Title: The Golden Phoenix
Author: emiartse
Summary: Summary: In his dreams, there had always been a voice. A soft melodic voice that sang their mother's lullaby. A more monotonous, but just as loving voice that promised he'd teach him to fight one day, once he was old enough of course. The doting voice of a mother laughs with a toddler as she gently tries to fix a small crown onto the boy's brow. And then there was the gentle voice of a father, that promised to always keep him safe from those who'd do them harm. And in the morning when the boy would awake, he'd wonder who exactly he needed to be protected from. "Tommy?" A voice called out from the doorway and Tommy grinned gleefully at the sight of his older brother. "Dream!" He yelled, stumbling out of bed and into his arms, hugging the man tight. His brother returned the hug in kind, his hands pressing warmly into the spot on his back where his wings would ignite from for the first time in a few days, fully grown. Surely Dream was all the protection Tommy would ever need in this world, right? A knot of doubt coiled tightly in his chest. ------------------------------------- AKA The DSMP Tangled AU nobody asked for.

Title: A Mountain I'm Willing to Die On
Author: Vee (Vera_DragonMuse)
Summary: Summary: In which they solve a murder, join a movement, and finish falling in love.

Title: Monsters Vs. Aliens
Author: acoolusername
Summary: Summary: Based off the Tumblr post: Lilo and Boo become room mates in college. They become fast friends, and Boo doesn't shy away from Stitch and Lilo doesn't think Mike Wazowski is a weird name for a fish. Everything is going smoothly, until one night when something sneaks into their dorm, and Stitch disappears into the closet...

Title: wherever i'm with you
Author: weatheredlaw
Summary: Summary: â€œImpressive, isnâ€™t it?â€ Stu adjusts his suspenders. â€œTwo hundred kids and not a single Nick or Nicky in the bunch. Like we were just waitinâ€™ for you.â€ or: nick meets the family

Title: She's Mine Then
Author: ArcticVulpix
Summary: Summary: Pepa had long been frustrated by her hermana's inability to tell their mama 'no'. But she's finally pushed too far after Mirabel's failed Gift ceremony. When Abuela decides to send Mirabel away for the sake of the family and the Miracle, Pepa's had enough. They don't want Mirabel? Fine. She's Pepa's now.

Title: Message Sent
Author: Aicosu
Summary: Summary: A wrong number turns into a torrid affair between strangers through texts.

Title: Looking Glass
Author: Feynite
Summary: Summary: She is tired. The world is ash and dust, and she has lost so many pieces of herself; markings and heart, left arm and left eye, trust and faith. It has become such a painful thing, to love him. And yet. And yet.

Title: Keeping Secrets
Author: ElvenSemi
Summary: Summary: Just another elf come to serve the Inquisition... That's what you hope to be, anyway. But you're an elf with a secret, and a little bit too much pride to just blend in peacefully.

Title: The Half-Life of Element Zero
Author: GraphiteGirl
Summary: Summary: After her discharge from the Alliance, Commander Helen Trevelyan joined the Andromeda Initiative, wanting to leave her personal tragedies and a psycho ex-boyfriend behind her. She expected to sleep for 600 years, and wake up in a med bay. Instead, she crash-landed on a snow-covered mountain, ten-thousand years later. She is alone, confused, and dying from eezo radiation. And the only sign of civilization is an old church in the distance. A Post-Modern Girl on Thedas fic. Many, many thanks to my betas, Dreadlordcherrycake and Duinemerwen, who have advised me on all matters of lore, plausibility and verb tense. If it wasn't for them, this story would still be in cryo. Any mistakes are mine, not theirs. I have a regular work schedule IRL, which means I don't have a regular update schedule on AO3. This story is visually supported. I sometimes tumblr at https://unhealthynpcobsession.tumblr.com/ Bioware owns all/legal boilerplate/blah blah blah.

Title: As the World Falls Down
Author: Khirsah
Summary: Summary: For the kink meme prompt: Josephine holds an Orlesian-style ball at Skyhold and everyone is to attend masked and out of uniform. Trevelyan decides that this is the perfect time to blow off some steam without giving anyone reason to brag about having slept with the Herald of Andraste, so she finds a partner for some masked, inebriated, anonymous sex. Unfortunately, she didn't realize that her stressed out, buttoned-down Commander had the same idea...

Title: half the lies you tell aren't true
Author: radiophile
Summary: Summary: It takes a long, long time for Dorian to realize that he is still waiting for the Bull to finish what he started.

Title: A Whole New World
Author: RogueLioness
Summary: Summary: Samarra Bayart is a researcher, albeit one with a small Dragon Age obsession. So when she finds herself in Thedas, she's convinced she's in a dream... till she realizes she's not. Given the title of Oracle, she must carefully walk the line between using her knowledge of the game to guide the Inquisition, while protecting herself and her secrets. Can she put what she knows to get the best ending for the ones she cares for? Or will she crash and burn in the wolf's jaws? [Note: NSFW chapters will be marked with a *]

Title: Wicked Grace
Author: lyriumveins
Summary: Summary: Garrett Hawke is a simple guy. He likes simple things. Things like playing MMORPGs with his friends. Their guild, Wicked Grace, has been pretty exclusive for a while. But, when the guild becomes interested in recruiting a new member - an elven warrior named Fenris - what used to be a "fun way of passing time" becomes "Operation: Hard in Hightown" (or, as Isabela calls it, "Operation: Get Hawke Laid"). Needless to say, this operation is anything but simple.

Title: Ace in the Hole
Author: staircased
Summary: Summary: Hawke spends most of his time getting rich and getting drunk (not necessarily in that order) while playing cards in taverns. While away from Kirkwall, he ends up playing against an overly confident Danarius who bets his slave, Fenris, as the main prize. (AU with canon setting)

Title: Apotheosis
Author: KeeperLavellan
Summary: Summary: After Wisdom had gone, I hadnâ€™t been sure that Solas would ever return. In time, he did, offering no more explanation than to say, I could hardly abandon you now. Even then the word seemed to catch in my ear. Now. Maybe once before and perhaps one day soon, but not just yet. On that point I had no illusions. Solas was not a man to promise forever, though he was afraid of dying alone. Chapters 68 through 82 cover the Protect Clan Lavellan war table mission, the canon story resumes with chapter 83.

Title: Odd One, or, Wally's Mysterious Boyfriend
Author: TheWitchBoy
Summary: Summary: Wally's new boyfriend is kind of odd. No, okay, scratch that. Wally's new boyfriend is super odd and itâ€™s been driving Barry nuts.

Title: "Time for a story" Drabble Series
Author: smkkbert
Summary: Summary: This fic shows Olicity and their life as a (married) couple with family. Although Olicity (and their kids) are the protagonists, other characters of Arrow and Flash make appearances. It started as a drabble series, but developed more and more into a full domectic AU. Although some chapters are still drabble-like, there are longer storylines by now. (All chapters are also available on Tumblr) The rating as "explicit" is only because of a few drabbles that contain smut, but those are rather rare. Most of the drabbles are fluff.

Title: A Game of Guess Who With Big Blue
Author: TheWitchBoy
Summary: Summary: â€œHe is happy and easygoing. Itâ€™s hard to believe that Batman raised him, sometimes. But, I mean, he has his broody moments...â€ â€œIs this a joke at my expense or something? That's the most intense kid Iâ€™ve ever met in my life."

Title: The Villain Wrangler
Author: lilhawkeye3
Summary: Summary: When Danny Johnson receives a sick child's wish to meet their favorite person- who just so happens to be a villain- he did what anyone would do: pour himself a strong drink and start searching online for their favorite bar. He doesn't expect for this to be a repeat occurrence, but the universe has other plans.

Title: Nightwing gets recruited, Red Hood gets caught and everyone gets grounded
Author: Silver_Athena
Summary: Summary: Nightwing gets recruited by the Justice League without Batman knowing. Red Hood gets caught by the Justice League without Batman Knowing. Now he knows and everyone is grounded. The manor might not be standing by the end of the week. ----- â€œOracle isnâ€™t my child,â€ â€œSounds fake but okay,â€

Title: The Misadventures of Cosplay Man
Author: Shynnohwen
Summary: Summary: After accidently getting launched through a natural rift and stuck in a alternate universe, Danny decides to help the local heroes while waiting to get picked up. But he doesnâ€™t do it as Phantom or Fenton, oh no. He doesnâ€™t want either of his identities to get mixed up in all this nonsense and get traced back to him. So what does he do? Crappy cosplay.

Title: Tumbling Together
Author: RedHead
Summary: Summary: When Barry and Len discover that theyâ€™ve accidentally become neighbors, they learn to navigate their new living situation amongst misunderstandings and a surprising amount of common ground. AKA the fun-as-it-comes Neighbors!AU which turns into a Pretend Relationship!AU filled with tropes, hijinks, and some vague notion of a plot.

Title: Unexpected Development
Author: nirejseki
Summary: Summary: â€œSorry, kid,â€ Len says, sounding â€“ and likely even being, knowing Len â€“ sincere. â€œWe gotta run, and it looks like youâ€™re coming with us for a bit.â€ â€œOh crap,â€ the kid (Barry Allen, he said his name was) says. ---- Response to tumblr prompt: Coldflashwave au, where Mick and Len end up kidnapping Barry for some reason after meeting the Flash, but before Len finds out his identity?

Title: Curiosity killed the cat, conspiracy killed the cape
Author: faithms
Summary: Summary: Tim continues on his way, past Bruce before B lightly grabs his arm. Tilting their heads in sync making some others at the table shiver, "Red Robin. Is something wrong?" Which at least calms down Superman and the other league members who looked like they were being attacked at their homebase by a hero they didn't recognize. Barry just looks on curiously. Nobody noticed his own head tilting in sync after all. "No, it's fine, B. I just know Flash is busy this week and I needed to ask him something, but he missed Sunday dinner. I figured he'd race off right after the meeting and your closing summaries are boring anyway," he shrugs as Oliver and Hal flinch back a little at someone dissing Batman so casually to his face. Bruce's lips twitch amused and Flash doesn't bother holding back a grin. "And you couldn't wait until next Sunday dinner? Or even better- ask anyone else in the family?" Some people look over at him with squinty eyes and the implications they are getting about the Flash's supposed connection to the Batclan. Barry's inner Dick Grayson is cackling.

Title: Love Me
Author: sinplicity
Summary: Summary: A meta-human with Cupid-like powers whammies Barry to fall in love with the first person he sees. Just his luck it happened to be Captain Cold. (â€œHe hasnâ€™t let go of me for almost an hour,â€ says Len, focusing his steel on Cisco, who shrinks considerably. â€œâ€™Cause I love you,â€ says Barry beside him, his teeth gleaming as he grins. He tries to kiss Len againâ€”god, the seventh time?)

Title: Satellite
Author: SpicyReyes
Summary: Summary: A rogue alchemist, desperate to restore the alchemy of the famous Fullmetal Alchemist, pushes Truth into playing a new game - one that has Edward Elric waking up on the floor of his house where a transmuted abomination should have been, just in time to save his younger self and brother. He might have a chance to do everything again, now, though...He would never hold anything but bitterness for the title of 'dad,' but maybe an older brother could make things better.

Title: we haunt ourselves
Author: sekalaista
Summary: Summary: "There's something funny about that kid," Maes says. "I just can't put my finger on it."

Title: build your wings on the way down
Author: ShanaStoryteller
Summary: Summary: Where the loss of ignorance is more valuable than the knowledge gained, and Edward figures out the source of alchemy a lot sooner than before. "Edward has cockroaches under his skin and leeches in his veins. He's vibrating and bursting and his body is too small, too big, doesn't fit quite right. He needs Al to know - needs to tell someone, anyone, but he will cut out his own tongue before he burdens anyone else with this knowledge." (Now with a TV Tropes page!)

Title: The Colours of the World
Author: MaiKusakabe
Summary: Summary: When Roy Mustang went to retrieve his eyesight from Truth, he wasnâ€™t expecting to end up doing a job in exchange. It couldnâ€™t even be an easy job, of course, because Edwardâ€™s assessment of Truth was a pretty accurate one.

Title: Son of the Desert
Author: ShanaStoryteller
Summary: Summary: Every time Edward sees the circle on the back Mustang's hand, he wants to scream, wants to reach across the desk and shake him, wants to wrap his hands around the older man's throat and ask if it was worth it, if this desk and his rank is worth the screaming, crying, writhing, burning bodies of his people - "Something to say, Fullmetal?" Mustang drawls. Edward snaps the file shut, "Nope." (Now with a TV Tropes page!)

Title: Know the Difference
Author: ShanaStoryteller
Summary: Summary: â€œYouâ€™ve heard the rumors,â€ Mustang says, looking at Ed over the top of his latest report, â€œabout the angels.â€ Ed scoffs and rolls his eyes, â€œAngels donâ€™t exist, donâ€™t be ridiculous.â€ â€œOf course, of course,â€ he murmurs, gaze sliding back down, â€œThere have been multiple eye witness accounts, however.â€ Ed slouches into the chair and doesnâ€™t bother to keep the contempt to from his voice when he says, â€œDonâ€™t depend on anything with wings to save you. Things that were made to leave always end up doing so, in the end.â€ â€œYes, well,â€ he says, â€œsometimes they come back.â€

Title: Trust Me, I'm an Alchemist
Author: metisket
Summary: Summary: In which Yuri Plisetsky began life with the name Edward Elric, and this has made the world of figure skating a significantly stranger and more alarming place. â€œAre you saying you lived a life of crime before you began skating?â€ â€œIâ€™m gonna have to check the statute of limitations on a couple things and get back to you on that.â€

Title: Cause for Concern
Author: metisket
Summary: Summary: Havoc's first encounter with the little Elrics. Havoc had been looking forward to meeting the Elric brothers, but heâ€™d been looking forward to it while thinking heâ€™d have the whole office as a buffer. He hadnâ€™t thought heâ€™d have them all to himself in a car for half an hour in traffic. He wasnâ€™t sure how he felt about that. Overjoyed was not the word.

Title: The Universe Just Doesn't Know What the Hell to Make of Edward Elric
Author: queerstang (rosethomass)
Summary: Summary: Everyone Edward's age gets their tattoos, gets to know who their soulmate is, and it's just one more thing to remind Edward of all the things he's lost and never got to have. Major spoilers for Brotherhood.

Title: Sins of the Father
Author: ShanaStoryteller
Summary: Summary: Hohenheim has been gone for fifteen years. It's time for him to go home - his wife is waiting for him.

Title: Imprinting
Author: PhenixFlare
Summary: Summary: Most people are born with a name tattooed on their inner wrist, in every written language imaginable; some people are born without. Dipper Pines is born with a small black triangle with a flesh colored dot at the center printed neatly onto his skin, standing out against its dark backdrop like an open eye. He doesn't know what to make of this.

Title: Cult Catastrophe
Author: JusticeHawk
Summary: Summary: A cult kidnaps Dipper and attempts to sacrifice him to a demon. Who turns out to be Bill. Bill of course, finds this hilarious.

Title: Faking It
Author: BurnerAccount
Summary: Summary: Dipper's the worst practitioner in his entire family. He's never been great at magic, he's struggling to improve - he doesn't even have a familiar. Maybe it's time to fix that. Dipper makes some mistakes. Based on a prompt from tumblr.

Title: Two in a Million
Author: Aevintyri
Summary: Summary: When Dipperâ€™s soulmark is exposed, revealing the name of the cold-blooded Emperor Cipher, he is brought to the palace to serve the demon tyrant. No one entertains the possibility of the truthâ€” that his soulmate is actually the kingâ€™s newborn son, Bill Cipher, who grows up deeply possessive of Dipper and just might end up more despotic than his father.

Title: When We Get Married
Author: LCypherED
Summary: Summary: â€œBill.â€ Dipper said, and something in his tone made Bill stop with his distracting touches. â€œDid you marry me without me knowing?â€ In which Dipper finds himself roped into a surprise marriage, and discovers that although Bill might be master of the mind, he is in no way a master of communication.

Title: Anyway, I've Been There
Author: Caleb Nova (Caleb_Nova)
Summary: Summary: It's the same place they left, but Dipper and Mabel aren't the same kids who left it. A story of the uneven after: new friends, new family, and the promise of a new tomorrow. (Gradual Dipcifica, Mystery Twins bonding, family ties, weird science, and the Power of Friendshipâ„¢â€”anthyding can hadplen!) Book One: anyway, i've been there (1-56) Book Two: new summer season (57-122) Book Three: a map to nameless stars (In Progress) *Currently on Hiatus*

Title: Hands (and Any Other Relevant Appendages) Off
Author: PhenixFlare
Summary: Summary: Bill Cipher doesn't like other people touching his things, and someone learns this the hard way; alternately, Dipper has further confirmation that he's dating a homicidal maniac and is surprisingly okay with it.

Title: Conspiratheory
Author: LCypherED
Summary: Summary: Dipper Pines deals with life, homework, friendships and his increasingly complicated feelings regarding the sulking ex-dream demon living in his closet. As well as the centuries-old mysteries lurking beneath the seemingly tranquil township he calls home, but that's beginning to become par for the course.

Title: Incalescence
Author: llyrical
Summary: Summary: Dipper just wanted to have a normal college life- well, as normal as one could have it while continuing to research the mysteries of Gravity Falls. He did NOT intend to have to deal with losing all of his work just as he needed it the most. He also did not intend to have a demon be his only chance of getting it back.

Title: Unidentical Twins
Author: Yevynaea
Summary: Summary: When theyâ€™re eleven, Mabel cheerfully coins the term â€˜unidentical twinsâ€™ and Dipper canâ€™t deny it fits.

Title: Permission to Touch
Author: Nyou
Summary: Summary: Lucifer is so lonely that he ignores every red flag because a smooth talking radio demon gave him attention. Rating gradually went from T to E. Earlier chapters are not explicit and very few are. I give smut warnings and indicate where they start and end in BOLD so you do not have to read the smut within this story!

Title: Ace in the Hole
Author: TaeFansick
Summary: Summary: Charlie has not been able to stop thinking about the comment Rosie made. Luckily her dad knows more than she does about this sort of thing.  Very slow burn with respect for Alastor's aroace identity!  TAGS AND RATING UPDATED DUE TO LATER CONTENT

Title: Call Your Bluff
Author: RazzAppleMagic
Summary: Summary: Val may be a fucking monster, but heâ€™s a monster that Angel knows. Heâ€™s a monster that Angel understands. Angel isnâ€™t stupid; he made the choice to sign with Valentino because he was the only overlord that made sense for Angelâ€™s lifestyle â€” for what Angel wanted out of Hell. But now youâ€™re tellinâ€™ him that his soul is owed to some random fucking jackass who swindled Val in a game of cards? How can that be fair? How can that be something thatâ€™s just allowed to happen? (In which, Angel's contract is acquired by a new overlord â€” Hell's very own Gambling Demon, and they both get more from the relationship than either of them bargained for.)

Title: Dapper Dresser [DISCONTINUED]
Author: AppleDaddyo
Summary: Summary: â€œI hate you, just so you know.â€ You huffed out dramatically. â€œOh, darling, you break my heart!â€ He put a hand to his head as if he were swooning. If there had been someone who was more dramatic than you had just been, it was him. He always tried to one-up you. â€œYou donâ€™t have a heart to break.â€ ___ Please refer to the discord or tumblr regarding the discontinuation.

Title: De-Lovely
Author: X_Gon_Give_It
Summary: Summary: It's a late and Lucifer can't sleep. He heads downstairs for a nightcap and finds more than he expects. AKA Alastor likes to cook in the middle of the night and these two can't go two minutes without throwing hands.

Title: The Hand That Feeds
Author: TrashDemonx
Summary: Summary: The phrase â€˜Hell is foreverâ€™ that Alastor heard thrown about so often in the recent months had never felt more on point than it did now. With Charlotte in heaven and the rest of his rag-tag band of hotel occupants absent for the evening, what he really needs is a quiet evening alone. Unless of course... entertainment decides to come knocking on his door. Literally. Set as a look at the evening of the hotel's sole occupant in Episode 6, and the King who has 'forgotten' his daughter isn't there. More parts and tags to be added as I go. They are all mapped out but I may split chapter 3 into two parts if it gets longer than anticipated.

Title: Smiling Man
Author: MuseValentine
Summary: Summary: Moving to New Orleans to start up her rehabilitation hotel for criminals hasn't been all berries for Charlie, especially if everybody thinks you're some Dumb Dora with a complete horseshit plan. And it's another jam that she's starting to get stuck on Alastor, the charming yet eccentric radio host next door who's never fully dressed without a smile. But she's all smiles too, and that's made her out to be quite the dish to Alastor - in all senses of the word - and boy, was he ready to be entertained.

Title: Ruination of Lucifer
Author: Syaunei
Summary: Summary: Charlie Morningstar, ever the ray of sunshine, asks Alastor to find out what's going on with Lucifer. Alastor takes to the task with gusto. Lucifer hates every second of it.

Title: you're out of touch (im out of time)
Author: highinfinities
Summary: Summary: If there's anything Lucifer has learned from his sunshiney daughter, it's that you've gotta kill them with kindness!  Or: Lucifer learns physical touch really gets under Alastor's skin. To appease Charlie, he starts showering Alastor with hugs and the like whenever he pisses him off. That way, Charlie is none the wiser to what he's doing, and Alastor gets a taste of his own medicine. ..The problem begins when Alastor starts seeking him out for affection.

Title: A Shot in the Dark
Author: Silver_pup
Summary: Summary: When he opens his eyes again, he finds himself in his old bed in his old home in his old body. Is this death? Or a trick of magic? Either way, Bilbo recognizes a second chance when he sees one, and this time his adventure with Thorin is going to go a bit differently.

Title: SansÃ»kh
Author: determamfidd
Summary: Summary: From a Hobbitkink prompt: The battle was over, and Thorin Oakenshield awoke, naked and shivering, in the Halls of his Ancestors. The novelty of being dead fades quickly, and watching over his companions soon fills him with grief and guilt. Oddly, a faint flicker of hope arises in the form of his youngest kinsman, a Dwarf of Durin's line with bright red hair. (Follows the story of the War of the Ring).   (Bagginshield, Gimli/Legolas) In which recovery takes time, the dead members of the Company take to watching Gimli as though heâ€™s a soap opera, the living struggle with being left behind, Legolas is confused, Khuzdul is abused, and Thorin is four feet and ten inches of guilt and anger. ~**~

Title: Para Bellum
Author: RyuuzaKochou
Summary: Summary: Hobbits always survive; even where trained and experienced soldiers don't. Has no one ever wondered about this? Thorin and the Company learn that it takes more than luck to be small in a big world. OR - Bilbo has unexpected skills and Thorin finds he likes them.

Title: Planting a Hobbit
Author: northerntrash
Summary: Summary: Bilbo liked Erebor, he really did. Even if everyone seemed convinced he was going to leave. In which soil causes international incidents, Thorin is over-dramatic, and dwarves are rubbish at keeping secrets. Oh, and they build a garden. Eventually.

Title: lay down your sweet and weary head
Author: Elenothar
Summary: Summary: Thorin dies. Thorin wakes up. He is understandably confused by this, especially since he appears to be in the Erebor he knew as a young dwarf, about to be attacked by a dragon. A time-travel fic with Thorin as the one living his life twice.

Title: You Got Me
Author: drunkonwriting
Summary: Summary: The Company shows their affection for Bilbo in accordance with dwarvish tradition. Bilbo... has no idea why everyone keeps giving him gifts. (Dwarves give gifts of craft to start friendships or romance. Everybody lives AU, canon-compliant through the first movie.)

Title: Safe and Distant
Author: Lindzzz
Summary: Summary: "Bilbo never bothers denying that he is a slight, little bit, probably infatuated with Thorin. Itâ€™s not something that bothers him. Really. Heâ€™s pretty sure that everyone very likely has a little flutter in their chest for the dwarf. Heâ€™s something grand and unattainable. And itâ€™s really much safer if it stays that way."

Title: Call You Home
Author: northerntrash
Summary: Summary: In which the Company are entirely too nosy about matters that are supposed to be a secret, and Bilbo learns that being concerned about propriety is overrated when you could be making friends instead.

Title: An Eye For Quality
Author: Linelen (Linelenagain)
Summary: Summary: FÃ­li lived his life by an old dwarven proverb: when a fool drops a treasure, a wise man picks it up (it sounded better in the original khuzdul). Bella Baggins never quite fit in the Shire. Perhaps she was made for the mountains, instead.

Title: Comes Around Again
Author: scarletjedi
Summary: Summary: Gimli closes his eyes, an old Dwarf on the brink of death in the home he had built with his husband in the Undying Lands, and opens them again as a young Dwarf in his childhood home in Ered Luin. He's returned to the tumultuous week before The Company set out to recruit their Burglar from his cosy hobbit hole. Gimli, once again a impetuous teen in the eyes of his family, must get into that Company--the lives of his loved ones, and the very fate of Middle Earth--depends on it.

Title: Unwanted Free Ugly Troll
Author: orphan_account
Summary: Summary: The first time you pass by the troll in the box you kind of try not to see it. It's gross as fuck when people do this. You guess maybe it's better than driving them out into the country and dumping them to make it on their own, or those stories you've heard about people dumping unwanted wrigglers in sacks into rivers--those you try not to think about because fuck, that is not okay on any level but it's not like you can do shit about it.

Title: Silence is Golden
Author: wittyy_name
Summary: Summary: John lost his ability to speak after his vocal chords were damaged due to a childhood illness. He's been picked on and bullied in school, but he has a lot of good friends who protect him. Dave is the new kid, an ironic jock, and a cool mystery. He's intrigued by the quiet kid and it isn't long before he develops a crush. Even though John's friends make it difficult for Dave to get close to him, but the cool kid is determined. This is the story of two boys who stumble through the awkwardness of young love and a communication barrier. Meanwhile a rejected friend and a stubborn brother meet and struggle to understand their own feelings.

Title: Looks just like the sun
Author: messageredacted
Summary: Summary: â€œHoly shit,â€ you whisper. Dave joins you at the window. There are no stars left in the sky. Nothing but blackness and a faint soap bubble sheen. â€œIs that a dream bubble?â€ Dave says. And then it swallows you.   Update: Now with a VERY NSFW illustration by Renaris.

Title: Within, Without
Author: reinkist
Summary: Summary: Dave just wants to be left alone. What's the point of anything when what's broken can never be completely fixed? This is the story of Dave Strider and Karkat Vantas, on the longest journey of their lives.

Title: Loophole
Author: saccharineSylph
Summary: Summary: Your name is John Egbert, and this is definitely not what you intended when you signed up to be a foster home for animals in legal cases. Either way, a bit of love and nursing to health, then his charges would be ready for trial, and a rewarding, happy home. You'd seen trolls on television and YouTube, they were popular exotic pets with celebrities. Certain breeds were even useful for guide pets and companion animals for the elderly. Since they were almost-sentient, of course. Almost.

Title: M.C. Escher that's my favourite MC
Author: Unda
Summary: Summary: Dirk has a plan, when he's 18 he's going to take Dave and get him the fuck out of their terrible lives and start over. Until then being the barrier between Dave and Bro is his only job, his soulmate is just going to have to wait goddamnit. Dave has a plan, it involves getting internet famous and not going gay, easy right? Karkat also has a plan, to repeatedly track down his dumb as rocks soulmate and get him to actually talk to him for fuck's sake.

Title: Don't Point That Finger at Me Unless You Intend To Use It
Author: orphan_account
Summary: Summary: From the kink meme: "so my idea, it's years after the game john can be anywhere from oh 17-23. for some odd reason he needs will be in texas for an undetermined amount of time and can't afford a hotel or renting his own place so dave suggests he stays at bro/daves apartment. no instant 'in lust' sex(fantasizing or UST is fine), must be built up as they actually learn about each other instead of what they know from dave. feel free to put in random 'odd couple' shenanigans as they get use to living together."

Title: Real Men Wear Tights
Author: Bananaramses
Summary: Summary: High school can be tough for everyone. This is especially true when you're hiding a secret that can never be told.

Title: The Finer Details of Gay Cluckbeast
Author: clumsyoctopus
Summary: Summary: Your name is Dave Strider and you are 26 years old. You have just gotten engaged. The problem being that you have just gotten engaged to your best male friend in a furious fit of stupidity, champagne, one-upmanship and a weird warm-glowy feeling that occasionally (or more than occasionally) rolls around in the pit of your stomach and makes you act like a moron. You have, over the past 13 years and much careful experimentation, dubbed this â€œThe Egbert Effectâ€. You would like to state, for the record, that you are definitely, completely and 100% NOT A HOMOSEXUAL. As Bro carefully describes to you what, as the DJ, heâ€™s going to play at the reception (almost entirely a medley of Nicki Minaj and Ke$ha), you carefully nurse a Rock Star and vodka like a 16 year old girl who just popped her cherry at prom and try to figure out what the fuck happened over the past decade or so to land you in this mess.

Title: The Serendipity Gospels
Author: urbanAnchorite (t_ZM)
Summary: Summary: "And then I saw a new Alternia, for the old Alternia had passed away." -- St. Troll John Cusack How the Empire knelt to a clown, a mutant and a lawyer.

Title: Interim
Author: starkraving
Fandom: The Legend of Zelda & Related Fandoms
Summary: Summary: She has no throne. Girls without thrones should not have knights, but hers wonâ€™t go. Princess Zelda â€“ the girl who killed Calamity â€“ would love to fade into legend, but Linkâ€™s bought a house, heâ€™s fighting off monsters, and heâ€™s selling giant horses to strangely familiar Gerudo men. She'll never have any peace now.

Title: To My Dearest Friend
Author: surveycorpsjean
Fandom: The Legend of Zelda & Related Fandoms
Summary: Summary: A month has passed since the downfall of Ganon, and the last thing Link is expecting is a prince at his door.

Author: T_5Seconds
Fandom: The Legend of Zelda & Related Fandoms
Summary: Summary: Link speedruns the game at record-breaking speed. What happens after a naked amnesiac with a soup ladle saves Zelda?

Title: Blood Moon Rising
Author: MarquesGillette
Fandom: The Legend of Zelda & Related Fandoms
Summary: Summary: The orphans living at The Sanctuary worship the angry god dwelling in Lake Hylia. Every year on the night of the blood moon, one of them is sacrificed to appease the god. Link is a non-believer due for a rude awakening.   Don't go around tonight, Well, it's bound to take your life, There's a bad moon on the rise

Title: Drown In Me
Author: bacchanalia
Fandom: The Legend of Zelda & Related Fandoms
Summary: Summary: [clickbait voice] He accidentally seduces a shark. What happens next will leave you wanting MORE.

Title: Dress for the job you want, not the one you have
Author: TheAngelicFifi
Fandom: The Legend of Zelda & Related Fandoms
Summary: Summary: The Gerudo clothing meant something very different to the Zora. Inspired by the secret cutscene you get by being sneaky.

Title: Sands of Time
Author: tirsynni
Fandom: The Legend of Zelda & Related Fandoms
Summary: Summary: Link awakens in the desert with no idea how he got there, to encounter his worst enemy...except it was the King of the Gerudo, not the King of Evil, he faced.

Title: On Propriety and Unconventional Avenues of Communication
Author: Advocaat
Fandom: The Legend of Zelda & Related Fandoms
Summary: Summary: (Post BOTW.) In which Link develops a very curious habit and Zelda is confused.

Title: Drowning (with) Me
Author: merpancake
Fandom: The Legend of Zelda & Related Fandoms
Summary: Summary: Link finds himself in a bit of trouble; lucky for him Sidon is there to help.

Title: Alone We Fight
Author: SilvermistAnimeLover
Fandom: The Legend of Zelda & Related Fandoms
Summary: Summary: "Well, Wild? This is your Hyrule. Have you figured out why we're here?" Time asked. "Yeah." Wild swallowed thickly, forcing bile down his throat. "Well?" Legend raised an impatient eyebrow, and Wild turned away. How was he going to explain this? He'd told them virtually nothing of his journey. How was he supposed to convey how terrible this situation was? That the Blights had been revived. "Come on. We're heading towards Zora's Domain." A gang-meets-Wild fic with an actual plot (I think). Featuring a Wild who's a tad more secretive about his journey. Linked Universe belongs to Jojo, and I'm just a fan. :3

Title: A Garden Across Our Collarbone
Author: PittedPeaches
Summary: Summary: Red Son desperately wanted to ignore it. He wanted to hike up his sleeves and tug on his collar and wait the sixty to eighty years it would take to get such humiliation off his skin. There was, however, a problem. His soulmate was an artist. (Soulmate au where what you draw on your body will appear on your partner. Canon compliant up to Season 3.)

Title: Sunbreak
Author: LadyGreenFrisbee
Summary: Summary: The Six-Eared Macaque's resurrection occurs just like the demoness planned. Everything else? Not quite so. Or: Macaque comes back from the dead, accidentally acquires a child and tries his best to dodge everyone else's attempts at inserting themselves into the situation, a certain King included.

Title: What a Wonderful Animosity
Author: kyrilu
Summary: Summary: Joker is preparing to celebrate his and Batmanâ€™s upcoming Nemesis Anniversary when he makes the devastating discovery that Batman is married to his roommate Bruce Wayne.

Title: This is Better Than the Two Boats
Author: Brokenpitchpipe
Summary: Summary: Everything should be fine now, except it isn't. Why does Batman still seem to brush Joker off? Why won't he listen to anything Joker says? Why won't he just get that they're supposed to be best enemies now? Well. Maybe his roommate Bruce Wayne can help.

Title: Same People, But Not Really
Author: KittyDemon9000
Summary: Summary: Kai quickly rolled over and carefully worked his cuffed hands in front of him. He practically ripped off the bag, only to be blinded by the sight before him. Ninjago City. Or, at least he thought it was Ninjago city. It was lit with every color of the rainbow, drowning out the stars above. The buildings all around him were the size of the tallest buildings in Ninjago City, but they didnâ€™t even come close to the tower in the middle of the city. Where in Ninjago was he? â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€” Aka Kai gets zapped to the Movieverse and shenanigans ensue

Title: In Which A Plothole Isn't A Plothole At All
Author: Dracze
Summary: Summary: â€œOkay,â€ Phyllis agrees, â€œbut I need all the bad guys locked up in here.â€ "I promise!" â€œAnd I mean all of them.â€

Title: Wizard King
Author: Mark_Ward
Summary: Summary: Old Title: Godfather and Godson Sirius Black was always said to be a playboy. What if he taught his godson a bit of his trade. A more mature and savvy boy-who-lived heads off to Hogwarts for his fourth year.

Title: Is this a Monkey-Thing or a Dad-Thing?
Author: ASamwich
Summary: Summary: Having a successor obviously meant spending time with them and training them. That was a given, so of course Wukong would get close to the kid! But there was absolutely no way that he was like a dad to Mk. Everything he did was strictly mentor-like, no parental action in sight. Right?

Title: From Three Thirty to Four
Author: PittedPeaches
Summary: Summary: Red Son wasn't exactly hiding the whole "Demon Bull King restaurant" thing, so why MK couldn't recognize he was the one manning the cash register, he had no idea. Don't get him stared on the flirting. (In which Red Son continues his culinary ventures with his father, and MK has a shockingly high spice tolerance. Canon compliant up to the Invasion of the Spider Queen.)

Title: Demonic Order
Author: Mizu_Rice
Summary: Summary: MK accidentally summons a demon, in a panic. he gives it an offering, which causes the demon to swear its services to the boy. which is fine. except, said demon is an arch nemesis-ex-best friend of his mentor.

Title: If you could date any of the ninja, which one would you date?
Author: ReddShoes
Summary: Summary: "If you could date any of the ninja, which one would you date?" "The green one, obviously." Lloyd gets sucked into a conversation he does NOT want to participate in. Set in the movie-verse, before the plot of the movie. Not actually shippy, but make what you want of it. 50% dialogue, 50% pain

Title: The Grass is Always Greener
Author: Sunnylighter
Summary: Summary: In a dire situation, Garmadon wishes on the Mega Weapon to ensure his son's safety. Neither he nor the ninja were expecting Lloyd to vanish and leave a strange teenager in his place. Meanwhile a world away, the Secret Ninja Force pays a visit to the formerly evil volcano, only to be left wondering where this green munchkin came from, and where their leader is? It's a race to switch them back, but when it comes time to, will they even want to? Beta Read by Kay Hau on Fanfiction.Net

Title: The Sun Rises Every Single Night
Author: Fabro-de-omres (Fabro)
Summary: Summary: Lloyd goes to sleep in 2017. He wakes in 2012. (Lloyd can't take his eyes off him. Cole's hair is so fluffy, short and puffed up at the sides and back, so unlike the long layers he boasts now. He's skinnier, too- twiggier, Lloyd might say was the situation anything different. But his thoughts have no room for jokes right now, let alone teasing. He's in a room with the baby versions of his teammates. He's in a room with the baby versions of his teammates.) "So," says Cole. "Time travel."

Title: Prodigal Prince
Author: TeuthidaRegina
Summary: Summary: Lloyd Garmadon, the son of evil Lord Garmadon, is a warlord-in-training, the terror of his high school, and all-around bad news. The Green Ninja is a hero, tirelessly fending off evil and protecting the city alongside the rest of the Secret Ninja Force. Nobody suspects the truth about either of them. (Or: Lloyd has his cake and eats it too. How hard can it be to keep things that way?)

Title: Meet Again
Author: northpen
Summary: Summary: Thousands of years into the future, Cole and Zane meet their friends again.

Title: Earbuds
Author: ReddShoes
Summary: Summary: The city of Ninjago is protected by the six ninja: Green, Red, Blue, Gray, Black, and White. Kai loves working as the Red Ninja, and honors the bonds he's formed with his teammates more than anything else. Things start to get complicated after he accidentally discovers Blue's identity- and, after he realizes Blue doesn't recognize him, a little awkward as well. Along with all of this, a new criminal organization on the rise is pushing the strength of the ninja's bonds, threatening them to fall apart. So uh basically ninjago is gotham now and miraculous ladybug-inspired identity hiding hijinks ensue. (ok hand emoji)

Title: Lloydâ€™s guide to surviving the merge (and finding new family through it)
Author: BlueberryPeach
Summary: Summary: A what if Lloyd met Sora and Arin much earlier and Kai didnâ€™t show up till a lot later than that? Lloyd raises both of them and a couple more kids on the way.

Title: Land of the Living
Author: CaptainBrookeworm
Summary: Summary: Lloyd was getting pretty sick and tired of getting kidnapped by snakes and evil scientists and nindroid armies, let alone all three at once. The only way it could be worse was adding his dad, a time machine, or a ghost. Way to jinx it.  Morro was perfectly miserable suffering through his afterlife in the Departed Realm, avoiding sage life lessons from the annoyingly persistent Sensei G. He was not expecting to be resurrected by a crazy mad scientist set on taking over all sixteen realms. He was even less prepared to face the green ninja - Lloyd - again, injured and imprisoned. So, he has a choice to make. Help the good doctor burn Ninjago to the ground, or do something crazy and stupid. FSM, Garmadon must be rubbing off on him.  --- (OR An evil scientist is dead set on ressurecting all of the ninjaâ€™s greatest enemies and happens to choose the most â€œfuck authorityâ€ one first. Lloyd wonders what his life has come to. The ninja have several heart attacks. Morro does his best.)

Title: Dark Matter
Author: mysterycyclone
Summary: Summary: The last thing Peter sees is Tony's horrified, heartbroken expression leaning over him. The guilt in his eyes is almost worse than the burning pain that's taking Peter apart piece by piece. The world starts to go dark. There's a flash of gold and green. For one moment, he finds himself standing amongst the Guardians and others. And then darkness again. It feels like blinking; an extended period of nothingness that ends as abruptly as it begins. One moment thereâ€™s nothing, the next thereâ€™s light. â€œEasy,â€ a woman says. Her words are gentle, and carry a slight accent that he canâ€™t place. "I'm called Wonder Woman. What's your name?"

Title: The Third Option
Author: Uncertainty_Principle
Summary: Summary: Homecoming AU. Ben and May divorced before Peterâ€™s parents died, so when Ben is murdered Peter goes into foster care. It takes just a tiny taste of superpowers for Peter to decide he doesnâ€™t want to put up with his horrible foster father anymoreâ€”the streets are infinitely more appealing. All he wants is to be Spider-Man anyway. So he leaves. Simple. Simple, that is, until Iron Man needs Spider-Manâ€™s help. Peter isnâ€™t about to turn down an opportunity to fight alongside Tony Freaking Stark, but he also isnâ€™t going to let his hero know that his recruit is a fifteen-year-old homeless dropout. So they strike a deal. Peter will help Tony. In return, the mask stays on. And thatâ€™s when things get complicated.

Title: Fitting In (Tiny Spaces)
Author: aloneintherain
Summary: Summary: Peter's trapped beneath a collapsed building during a mission, hurt and unable to move. Luckily, his comm still works. Unluckily, the Avengers donâ€™t realise how bad of a state Peter is in, and Peter isnâ€™t inclined to tell them.  â€œSpidey, theyâ€™ve got reinforcements. Weâ€™ve hit a bit of a snag here, and I donâ€™t think anyone will be able to help you for a while. Think you can sit tight while we deal with this?â€ The pressure on his lower back and legs was becoming too much. Peter swallowed thickly, fighting down panic. He could handle this. â€œYeah,â€ Peter said. â€œI can do that.â€

Title: Mistake on the Part of Nature
Author: idiopathicsmile
Summary: Summary: Steve takes in Bucky's betrayed look and Sam's confusion, follows Sam's gaze to the pile of mangled fruit in the trash can. Sudden comprehension fills his face. "Oh," he says. "Bucky found out about bananas."  In which an American icon is mourned. But probably not the one you're thinking of.

Title: A Different Kind of Mask
Author: aloneintherain
Summary: Summary: â€œSo, you remember the plan, right?â€ Matt whispered. The sirens in the distance picked up, the sounds of the police officers on foot growing louder. â€œYouâ€™re blind and Iâ€™m just a scared teenager,â€ Peter said back, nodding. â€œGot it.â€

Title: Quackery
Author: CAPSING
Summary: Summary: In a world where the first words your soulmate will say to you appear on your left wrist at your tenth birthday, Peter gets the short end of the stick.

Title: Astronomy In Reverse
Author: pansley
Summary: Summary: A year after the Winter Soldier failed his mission in DC, Bucky Barnes is doing his best to stay under the radar from both Hydra and Steve Rogers. His hope for a peaceful day-to-day life in limbo goes awry, however, when he meets Queensâ€™ newest hero; a pure-hearted kid with a death wish and a ridiculous pair of red and blue pajamas. The last thing Steve expects when he finally tracks Bucky down is that, not only has the man been living in Queens all this time, right under his nose, but also that, in the two years since they last saw each other, Bucky somehow acquired a kid. Alternatively: How Peter Parker effectively fucks over Bucky Barnes, and also totally saves him.   Fanart by Monireh on AO3 and tumblr

Title: The Twice-Told Tale
Author: arysteia
Summary: Summary: For someone he'd hero-worshipped for so long, Steve Rogers in the flesh is a pretty big disappointment. For one thing, he keeps looking at Tony as though he reminds him of someone else, and even if he never says anything, Tony's pretty sure it's his father. A lifetime of not measuring up to Howard's expectations is more than enough, thank you very much, and he's certainly not going to make an effort to live up to any of Steve's. Steve's pretty clearly failed to live up to his expectations, in any case, and that's not hypocritical at all.
