Author: soft_satan
Summary: Summary: â€œLong story short, your kid is too damn smart," Buck began. "Seriously, Eddie, maybe you need to pull him out of that fancy school and send him back to public school. Dumb him down a bit so heâ€™s easier to handle.â€ Buckâ€™s words became so tangled in his anxiety that he couldnâ€™t really process what he was saying. â€œWhat the hell are you talking about? Is Chris okay? Is he in trouble?â€ â€œHeâ€™s fine. Safe and sound, happy as a clam, but Iâ€™d say he is definitely in trouble.â€ ... In which Eddie's parents hate Buck, and Christopher is too damn clever.

Title: Stick With You
Author: soft_satan
Summary: Summary: Eddie licked his dry lips as he reached for his radio, trying to keep his movements slow and delicate to prevent any more damage to himself or Buck. â€œDiaz to Captain Nash.â€ â€œGo for Nash,â€ came Bobbyâ€™s quick reply. â€œYou two okay? Where are you?â€ â€œWeâ€™re in a bit of a sticky situation hereâ€¦â€ â€œWeâ€™re a shish kabob, Cap!â€ Buck chimed in. Eddie rolled his eyes.

Title: the distance to the stars
Author: cloudydaisies
Summary: Summary: â€œDidnâ€™t know you were seeing someone.â€ Buck just laughs. Like, honest to god giggles. Eddie is stuck fighting off doubly massive waves of butterflies and confusion, all while Buck just gazes down at him. â€œThatâ€™s cute,â€ he hears Buck mumble, just before climbing into the truck, calling Eddie after him. - or, everyone knows eddie is dating buck except for eddie, literally.

Title: Reset
Author: Eggplant_Crusader
Summary: Summary: Everyone knows Wednesday and Enid have been dating for months now. The only problem is, no one thought to let Wednesday know.

Title: San Francisco
Author: bishopsinclair_ (dustydandelions)
Summary: Summary: The mystery surrounding Nevermore has finally been solved causing the term to end earlier than expected as the school recoups after the loss of two faculty members. Enid returns home to San Francisco where she comes face to face with a mystery centered around her. There she finds out what it means for a wolf who shifts for the first time while under the blood moon. Enid may just be more powerful that she thought. If only her mother would stop setting her up with a potential mate as she deals with new revelations. Good thing Wednesday is there to save the day, solve the mystery, and show a werewolf they stand no chance at winning Enid's affections.

Title: In the Heat of the Moment
Author: PumpkinsBelow
Summary: Summary: â€œThenâ€¦â€ Enid steels herself. â€œThen can I touch myself, or not?â€ Wednesday exhales, uncrossing her arms. â€œYou may.â€ This fucking girl. â€œFine,â€ Enid says in a small voice, scooting back on the bed. She feels cowed and decidedly not turned on, shoved as far away from her as possible against the unforgiving headboard. This was not how she saw her Thursday afternoon going when she escaped to find some privacy.

Title: The Ghost in your Videos
Author: MsMio
Summary: Summary: â€œwho is that behind u???!!!â€ â€œIS THAT A GHOST!?â€ â€œTHEREâ€™S A REALLY HOT GIRL BEHIND YOU!!!!â€ Enid spins in her chair, and her scream surely peaks her microphone. Wednesday, in all of her goth glory, stands right behind Enid with her usual deadpan look. â€œEnid, youâ€™re live streaming.â€ Or the AU where Enid is a YouTuber, and her fans can't stop asking about her goth roommate after she appears in one of the live streams.

Title: what does he have that I don't?
Author: k0feew_milkk
Summary: Summary: Wednesday came in, closing the door behind her and walking up to her desk without even sparing her a second glance. That itself wasnâ€™t unusual, it actually happened almost every night; what caught her attention was the way the other girl smelled. She smelled like Tyler. or that one fic where enid scents wednesday's clothes because she doesn't want her smelling like anybody else

Title: if we make it through december
Author: overnights
Summary: Summary: Thereâ€™s a pause, and then Wednesday speaks again. â€œI admit that I do have one ulterior motive in asking you to visit for the holidays.â€ Enid laughs, unsurprised; thereâ€™s the Wednesday she knows, even a phone line and a coast away. â€œYeah? What is it?â€ â€œI told my parents that Iâ€™m in a relationship,â€ Wednesday says, offhand, like itâ€™s just another sentence and not a lightning strike to Enidâ€™s heart. "With you, specifically."

Title: there it is again, that funny feeling.
Author: camomile_t
Summary: Summary: Suddenly, like the unpredictable spring of a cobra, the answer struck her. â€œOh. I understand. Youâ€™re courting me.â€ She pauses for a moment, thinking. She notices and chooses to ignore the gradual parting of Enidâ€™s lips as her mouth gapes. â€œVery well then. You may continue.â€ AKA: The fic where Enid stumbles into the Addamâ€™s family tradition of formal courtship, and is left to continue to stumble through the process.

Title: The Devouring of Hearts
Author: RayShippouUchiha
Summary: Summary: Toniâ€™s gums ache for a split second, fresh blood flooding her mouth before she swallows it. And in that next second that curl of darkness inside of her sits up and decides that this, that Howardâ€™s continued cruelty and abuse, will no longer be allowed. Toni licks the blood from her now too sharp teeth before she plants her hands on the floor in front of her and pushes herself back up onto her feet. This time when Howard lashes out at her Toni ducks low to avoid the blow. Crouched on the hall floor, sharp nails digging into the dark wood beneath her, Toni hisses, takes a moment to calculate, and then she leaps.

Title: A Kidnapping By Any Other Name (OLD VERSION) (INCOMPLETE)
Author: RavenMoon33
Summary: Summary: It all starts with the unexpected early end to the semester. Everyone else is elated to get an early start to their winter vacations. All Enid can feel is dread. Or: In which Enid is bummed out at the prospect of returning home for an extra long winter break, and Wednesday decides to fix it, as only an Addams can. Vietnamese Translation by rainbow99 Chinese Translation by ZhanxiZhang

Title: Go Easy On Me
Author: mrsassbutt
Summary: Summary: Wednesday Addams detested love. She didnâ€™t need nor did she want it. Enter Enid Sinclair. Add some werewolf mating drama. A dash of teen angst. A sprinkle of dark horror. And it might just be a recipe for disaster. OR Enid Sinclairâ€™s mate is Wednesday Addams and sheâ€™s kind of freaking out.

Title: We're Not There Yet
Author: Isnt_it_pretty_to_think_so
Summary: Summary: â€œReaching for the door, Mr. Stark?â€ Peter asks, the sound muffled. Tony snorts. â€œYou know me so well, kid.â€  OR: The real reason why Peter Parker never made Tony Stark's A-team.

Title: Wands and Arrows
Author: Runic_Purple_Panda
Summary: Summary: Drabbles based on seventy-five randomly generated words. Clint Barton's wife was the most terrifying person Natasha had ever met, including the Winter Soldier who had shown up one time and killed her charge by shooting through her.

Title: Just Can't Get a Break
Author: Selene_Eleganza
Summary: Summary: Percyâ€¦ isnâ€™t entirely sure how he got here. Hang on. Rewind. Play the tape again. Okay. He was just having a normal day. The sun was shining, the birds (pigeons) were singing, Manhattan traffic was abysmal, and everything was fine. And then a portal appeared in the sky over one of the tallest towers on the island and shit hit the fan.  And, really, what's a demigod to do when his city's under fire? So now he's on the world's radar, and that's no fun. But, watching government agencies and Avengers froth at the mouth when they find him in the most random places or can't find him at all? Now that... that might be a little fun. â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€” Slow to update due to a drastic increase in the authorâ€™s responsibilities. But it ainâ€™t dead! â¤ï¸

Title: The Old Gods Called, They'd Like Their Kingdom Back
Author: Rhino (RhinoMouse)
Summary: Summary: When two individuals explode out of the heart tree at Winterfell, the Bolton's think it's a blessing from the gods. It certainly is a change in their fortunes. Sansa expected to die the day the Bolton's did after their guest made the ground shake with her fury. Only she didn't, and now she is nominally the one in charge. With no army, no support outside of those men who saw an angry god and decided not to help their liege Lord, and said god is now her terrifying guest. Daisy would like to stop being mistaken for a god, and also reiterate flaying innocent people alive is not an acceptable practice. It would help if Fitz would wake up already because she's clearly not going to be able to get them out of the medieval hellscape they're now trapped in. Although Fitz wouldn't be her first choice of companion to be stranded with. And magic ice zombies, because of course there's magic ice zombies.

Title: Lucky Pennies
Author: IamShadow21
Summary: Summary: In Clint Barton's official SHIELD file, there is a supplemental form with a string of letters and numbers indicating a superhuman ability. On it, there are two pieces of information. The first is 'Asset-Reported Ability (unverified)'. The second is 'Combat/Field Applicable Ability Y/N'. 'N' is circled.

Title: Family is What You Make It
Author: GoringWriting
Summary: Summary: When Tony is left in that Siberian bunker it's not Pepper or Rhodey, or even Vision that find him. It's a Hydra team. Tony resigns himself to being their science experiment when he's rescued by an unlikely team and he finds out that family is what you make it and along the way he manages to gain some allies, friends, and maybe something more.  (This work was inspired by Families by Isimile)

Title: In The End, She Appears
Author: cuddliestcactus
Summary: Summary: "You a screamer, Lewis?" Clint tried to leer at her, but it came off a little more drunk puppy than Rico Suave. "Trust me, no one likes it when I scream." Darcy wished she was kidding.   Or the one where Darcy's a banshee

Title: Through The Veil
Author: TheFeistyRogue
Summary: Summary: Harry crosses through the veil and ends up in another universe, where there aren't any witches or wizards, but there are aliens, superheros, and secret agents.

Title: Soulmate Shorts AKA The Crackship Armada
Author: ozhawk
Summary: Summary: Concept borrowed from amusewithaview's Soulmates AU, where the first words soulmates say to each other appear on their skin. Featuring characters from Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. paired with Avengers, X-Men and more. Note: I do have a poll but it's on FF.net; I can't figure out how to reproduce it here! The below link will take you to the poll there. Poll That should take you to my fanfiction profile. At the top of the page is a link to the poll. I'm not sure if you have to be a member there to vote or not, sorry, though if you aren't it's easy enough to set up!

Title: More than just a boy, More than just a shield.
Author: SassySteter (Sterekismyotp)
Summary: Summary: Stiles felt more than saw his father still in front of him, holding his breath for a moment before he finally exploded. â€œThatâ€™s it, Stiles! I am done with all of this: the lies, the secrets. I am your father, I am supposed to keep you safe. I thought we were close enough for you to come to me with anything, but obviously whatever it is you've gotten yourself involved in is way over your head!â€ Stiles tried not to slump under the disappointment and anger in his fatherâ€™s voice, the bruises on his face pinching with the grimace he pulled. â€œDad, I-â€œ â€œI donâ€™t want to hear it, Stiles. I was out of my mind worrying about you! Jackson was killed out on that field and you went missing, I didn't know what to think! You've changed so much in the last few months. The son I knew would never have gotten himself in these situations. Itâ€™s obvious that with how busy I am with work Iâ€™m gone too often to keep an eye on you and make sure youâ€™re out of trouble. So Iâ€™m going to do the next best thing. Iâ€™m sending you live with your Uncle Phil.â€

Title: Roller coaster -rides in the land of fluff, first meetings and romance (see summary)
Author: VenlaMatleena
Summary: Summary: Reader-insert -stories about my favorite guys (both fictional and real, see tags). Some of these "oneshots" have sequels and some don't. These stories are roller coaster -rides of romance, cliffhangers, drama and conflicts, spiced up with feelings (everything from love and butterflies to angst, confusion and hate) and fluff. !!!ATTENTION/WARNING!!! * I am ONLY writing about the subjects/characters that I love because this is a hobby of mine; I write because I love telling stories. * I am NOT writing about real people anymore. * I am not a native English-speaker, so there are grammar/spelling mistakes. I do my best. * Yes, I write dialogue with "-" and it is not going to change. Sorry. * Some of the stories grow very long and I am not writing equally about every tagged character, this is due to my own personal interests. * Plenty of elves! Nowadays mostly just elves because I love them and their world is awesome! * Some of the stories have some smutty fluff. No requests, sorry.

Title: You Don't Know Where He's Been
Author: sifshadowheart
Summary: Summary: Death offers his Master a way to escape from the forces controlling him in the wizarding world. Harry probably should've asked for a better explanation on just what Death was going to do to him in the process. Or where Death planned to send him... Chapters flagged with individual warnings for mature, violent, and/or explicit content as the story progresses.

Title: Small Beginnings
Author: shadeshifter
Summary: Summary: Tony gets his own team... at the FBI.

Title: Where We Love Is Home
Author: shadeshifter
Summary: Summary: Tony catches a new case and there are several forces working behind the scenes. Then Gibbs gets the same case.

Title: i think you need a shotgun blast
Author: postcardmystery
Summary: Summary: She is not the Slayer and he is not the Slayerâ€™s Watcher, but their roles are almost as old as human civilisation and they fall into them without even truly having to try. Title: Fresh Blood
Author: stridermagic
Summary: Summary: Five times Harry offers his blood to a vampire and 1 time a vampire offers his blood to him.

Sister for sister, Jughead doesnâ€™t realize the value this slip of a woman with golden hair and green eyes has and just what her brother is willing to sacrifice to get her back.

Author: underneaththewalnuttree
Summary: Summary: Veronica has made what she acknowledges is considerable progress in her mission of becoming an objectively good person. But what Cheryl isâ€”mean, contemptuous, hyper-criticalâ€”is what Veronica used to be. And when sheâ€™s prompted to defend herself against some demeaning allegation, lapsing back is really, really easy. Cheryl smiles, much too casually, and begins. â€œAs a firsthand witness to your ill-advised, gratuitous lip-lock with Betty Cooper at the Vixen tryouts, I assume you have no qualms about kissing girls?â€ Veronica lapses back. Summary: Summary: Tony DiNozzo's Black Book is ever full. These are just a few names of who might be in there.

Title: This Rage is the One Thing I Get from my Father

He continued his story even as he fixed himself a stronger drink than he would have liked. â€œA small favor, come to think of it. He asked for a child. He and Diana were trying for years, but no spell or potion could give them what they wanted. I thought it simple enough. I mean, Father sent my brothers to bless humans with children all the time." His face soured as he emptied the glass in one gulp. â€œIt wasnâ€™t like that, though.â€ He had a grim look to him as he sank back down to his seat across from her. â€œI soon realized that I didnâ€™t have the same gifts as Amenadiel. I couldnâ€™t channel the divine light of life the way he could. Butâ€¦Edward was relentless, and I was, too. After all, the Devil never left a favor ungranted. So in the end, I did give him a child.â€ Sabrina held her breath as the next words were softly uttered from his mouth. â€œI gave him mine.â€ In which Sabrina Spellman goes to L.A. to escape Greendale's witches and demons and magic, only to end up with a devilish father, angelic uncle, and very confused detective in the process.

Title: i just want you to know who i am
Author: cheryltonis
Summary: Summary: it's hard enough being a teenager in 1995. but to cheryl blossom, nothing is harder than being the pastor's daughter with a secret crush on toni topaz, riverdale high's resident hbic.

Title: Scars

Summary: Summary: When rising photographer Jughead Jones scores a photo shoot with model-of-the-moment Betty Cooper, he expects to use it, simply, to help his career take off. What he doesn't expect, is to be so enraptured with her beauty. Or for the single shoot to turn into a series of stunning portraits, Or to witness the marks on her palms grow into burns across her skin. . What he doesnâ€™t expect either, is to be her salvation.

Title: Scuff
Author: WhoLenny
Summary: Summary: Cheryl Blossom had had two scuffs mar her young life thus far. The first, had been her shoe at 6 years old, scuffed by defying her mother's orders and strict social convention. The second, had been the beautiful, and tragically fast-removed, Heather scuffed by a first-love and sexual deviance. So, here she sat, as she gazed innocuously upon the pink-hair cascading in waves down a slender back and the gleaming eyes of a serpent peering up at her from the back of her jacket. Toni Topaz. A serpent. A vixen. And, Cheryl thought with a dizzying elation she hadnâ€™t felt in years, a brand new scuff on her life.

Title: The Real Suspension of Disbelief
Author: punk_rock_yuppie
Summary: Summary: The first time Archie tries to confess his feelings to Jughead... well, Jughead thinks he's joking.

Title: Southside High

Summary: Summary: Due to the start of Riverdale Highâ€™s complex renovations, the school is shut down for one year and all Riverdale High students are forced to attend Southside High. In an effort to integrate at her new school, Betty goes to a meeting for the Red and Black and meets the Serpent Prince, Jughead Jones. AU: Jughead Jones is a Southside High student and, therefore, doesnâ€™t know any of the regular Riverdale High students.

Title: Ride or Die
Author: Vixx2pointOh
Summary: Summary: They say that life is a series of events that we can neither predict nor control.... And then there is him. Heâ€™s a bit of an enigma. ~*~*~*~ Young CEO Felicity Smoak is just trying to make her mark on the world, yes she's a little high strung and stressed, but it was what is was... until he came along. With eyes a girl could lose herself in and shoulder-tapping hair made for hanging on to Oliver Queen was reckless and carefree. Also, he rode a bike. He was everything she wasn't and he was a sucker for those sinful red lips and everything that came with them. *main story complete, now snapshots* Or, the Sons of Anarchy-esque AU that I never knew I needed.

Title: "Time for a story" Drabble Series
Author: smkkbert
Summary: Summary: This fic shows Olicity and their life as a (married) couple with family. Although Olicity (and their kids) are the protagonists, other characters of Arrow and Flash make appearances. It started as a drabble series, but developed more and more into a full domectic AU. Although some chapters are still drabble-like, there are longer storylines by now. (All chapters are also available on Tumblr) The rating as "explicit" is only because of a few drabbles that contain smut, but those are rather rare. Most of the drabbles are fluff.

Title: Forever Is Composed Of Nows
Author: Bre
Summary: Summary: Sometime in the not-so-distant future, things aren't going all that well. At least that's the story Oliver and Felicity are told when a supposed time-traveler (and their supposed friend who is a supposed superhero supposedly named The Flash) pops up in the lair with a toddler in tow... who calls them momma and daddy. The Flash can't quite control when he's going at this point and there's a big bad chasing him through the years. The future isn't safe for little Elizabeth Queen at the moment (even if The Flash could get her there), but her once and future parents haven't got a clue what to do with her. Slade Wilson, however... he might have his own agenda when he finds out his nemesis is apparently a father.

Title: What happened in Vegas...
Author: Jules_Ink
Summary: Summary: It's all fun and games until you wake up hung-over and married to a stranger. Five years ago Oliver Queen and Felicity Smoak made a drunken mistake that could never be corrected. After years on a hellish island he comes back as a man on a mission only to find out that what happens in Vegas doesn't always stay in Vegas. (Season One Rewrite)

Title: Pink on Green: Reloaded
Author: sssssssim
Summary: Summary: Olicity drabble collection. Continuation of Pink on Green.

Title: The Line ||
Author: Vixx2pointOh
Summary: Summary: Felicity Smoak is no one special.  Her life is simple, her job pays the bills, and she prefers it that way.  But, when her roommate goes missing and no one is prepared to look for her, Felicity embarks down a path she might not easily come back fromâ€¦ if at all. Itâ€™s a path that puts Felicity directly in the crosshairs of the CÃ¡rtel de la Sangre, and ultimately into the arms, and bed, of the very man who might have the answers, Oliver Queen.  Heâ€™s bad news with pale eyes and a devilâ€™s smile that hides a world of secrets, while she reminds him of innocence and of everything he lost to become who he is. Set into the dark backdrop of drugs, sex, and murder, both of these strangers are willing to cross lines in search of the truth.  But at what cost?  ||COMPLETE

Title: Queen of Hearts

Summary: Summary: Pregnancy trope Felicity finds herself pregnant, but she and Oliver don't remember how it happened.

Title: Pink on Green

Title: Dying to Return
Author: StormDancer
Summary: Summary: When they try to hang him, he floats. * They put him on the pyre at dawn. He doesnâ€™t burn.

Title: That's His Name
Author: ZairaA
Summary: Summary: In a world where Arthur and Merlin never went to Ealdor, Merlin is home visiting his mum. People soon are getting annoyed about all his talk about this Arthur chap, they don't believe for a second that Merlin of all people could be close to the king. Until the king pays a visit. Written for prompt #87 at Merlin Muses Prompt Fest

Title: And like the cycle of the year, we begin again
Author: katherynefromphilly
Summary: Summary: Set after the Merlin Series 5 Finale "Diamond of the Day". Canon Compliant. In Character. Arthur Pendragon Returns. Cover art by Lao-Pendragon ------ For many long years Merlin waited. For the other part of his soul, for the other half of his life. He was born to serve Arthur. So that meant he was also born to wait. Even if it took a thousand years. Even if the wait seemed never to end. Until one day, suddenly, it did. When Arthur stumbles from the Lake of Avalon 1,500 years after his death, he finds a world unlike the one he knew. Faced with the loss of everyone he loved, and the threat of impending prophecy, Arthur must learn what it means to be not just a king, but the Once and Future King. Merlin does all he can to guide him, even as he struggles to hide his love for his king, and his fear of losing him again. Story includes sass, banter, horseplay, & True Love.

Title: The Truth Is You
Author: bigmamag
Summary: Summary: Arthur lies to a sorceress and gets slapped with a truth spell. Awkwardness ensues.

Title: Strike of Lightning
Author: helloearthlings

Title: Have you Heard
Author: CaffeinatedFlumadiddle
Summary: Summary: â€œThey say Emrys tamed the great dragon of Camelot and sired the white dragon of Albion-â€ â€œSired?â€ Gwaine interrupted â€œThis Emrys fellow is going around siring dragons? How exactly is that happening? Sex with other dragons?â€ He asked and despite the situation, Merlin flushed. The man in question blinked, looking equally baffled by the question. From the corner of his eye, Merlin could see Arthur pinching the bridge of his nose. â€œUhâ€¦I actually donâ€™t know.â€ â€œBut youâ€™re Emrys,â€ Merlin reminded the imposter with a sigh â€œYou donâ€™t remember siring any dragons?â€ â€œI said it was an off day!â€ The man complained, trying to cross his arms despite being upside down. Merlin took a long breath. Lancelot had already walked away, but that did nothing to hide his howling laughter. Or The knights keep hearing various (dramatic) rumors about the great and mighty Emrys. Everyone is such a gossip. Merlin is trying not to have a heart attack. Lancelot is loving life.

Title: The Student Prince
Author: FayJay
Summary: Summary: A Modern day Merlin AU set at the University of St Andrews, featuring teetotal kickboxers, secret wizards, magnificent bodyguards of various genders, irate fairies, imprisoned dragons, crumbling gothic architecture, arrogant princes, adorable engineering students, stolen gold, magical doorways, attempted assassination, drunken students, shaving foam fights, embarrassing mornings after, The Hammer Dance, duty, responsibility, friendship and true love... This story was inspired by the thought of Prince William of Wales (and indeed the current Max von Hapsburg) studying at the University of St Andrews; it is also, as the title suggests, at least a little inspired by the operetta 'The Student Prince'. Grateful thanks to Lamardeuse and DarkEmeralds for Beta and cheerleading! ::2019 note: This story was written BEFORE the TV show introduced the character of Gwaine. It's not that I can't spell, or that I'm perversely writing him out of character - I incorporated other characters from Arthurian legend (Kay, Gawain etc) into my story, and lacking prophetic abilities, my versions naturally don't mesh with the versions subsequently introduced into the show.::

Summary: Summary: â€œI was wondering if you might come home with me.â€ Merlin stops mid-rant and stares at him, and then down at his panini again, and back at Arthur. This is a panini of lies and pain. He can tell already.   â€œFor Christmas? Iâ€™ve got an uncle and a mother and a sister waiting for me at home, in case you hadnâ€™t remembered, Iâ€™m not going home with you just because youâ€™re a workaholic.â€   â€œNo, itâ€™s. My mum might be under the impression that weâ€™re a little bit married.â€  In which Merlin gets conned into spending Christmas with Arthur's family and pretending to be his husband, because somehow this is his life.

They noticed the wine with narrowed eyes as Morgana dramatically poured herself a glass three sizes too big without uttering a word to suggest why. â€œWhat â€“?â€ Leonâ€™s face scrunched up in confusion. â€œArthur,â€ Morgana declared, gulping down too much wine at once in order to prepare herself for the bone-chilling announcement, â€œis bringing his new boyfriend over tonight.â€

Title: Dark Matter

Summary: Summary: The last thing Peter sees is Tony's horrified, heartbroken expression leaning over him. The guilt in his eyes is almost worse than the burning pain that's taking Peter apart piece by piece. The world starts to go dark. There's a flash of gold and green. For one moment, he finds himself standing amongst the Guardians and others. And then darkness again. It feels like blinking; an extended period of nothingness that ends as abruptly as it begins. One moment thereâ€™s nothing, the next thereâ€™s light. â€œEasy,â€ a woman says. Her words are gentle, and carry a slight accent that he canâ€™t place. "I'm called Wonder Woman. What's your name?"

Title: Batcellanea
Author: envysparkler
Summary: Summary: A collection of outtakes, alternate POVs, and missing scenes from my existing work. 188-221. whumptober fills.

Title: the bat's nest
Author: helenabertinellis
Summary: Summary: The Justice League knew that Batman didn't trust anyone; they also knew that they were probably the closest he got. Aside from them, Batman worked alone. At least... they thought they knew that. Then they met his kids.

Title: Take Care of Business
Author: TheResurrectionist
Summary: Summary: Summary: Bruce has a conference call with Wayne Enterprises. Having it at the Manor was, in hindsight, a really shitty idea. â€œI donâ€™t have your phone!â€ The two boys began trading hits, yelling at the top of their lungs. Bruce turned back to the webcam just as Damian leapt on top of Timâ€™s back, a high-pitched battle cry torn from his lips. â€œMr. Hodges,â€ he said cheerfully, unflinching as Tim threw Damian into the wet bar sink. â€œHave you had a chance to examine the chart I pointed out?â€ Inspired by this viral video and Batwaynemanâ€™s post on tumblr.

Title: Bus to Nowhere
Author: foldingfacets
Summary: Summary: Is it running from your problems if your problems consider you to be a dead imprint of consciousness that killed their son? Yes, but Danny tries not to think about how his nightmares of his parents trying to kill him came true when they found out he was Phantom. After being on the run from his parents and the government for a couple of months, moving from town to town, Danny ends up in Gotham City and decides to risk staying in Batman's territory. He'd take the wrath of Batman over live vivisection via beloved parents or being studied and torn apart by the government. Besides, he's not a meta. Being dead is a medical condition.

Title: Watch This
Author: snackbaskets
Summary: Summary: Hal and Barry are worried about Batman's new partner. Being around the Batman all the time can't be good for a kid, right? Robin insists otherwise, and for $15.36 of betting money, is happy to demonstrate.

Title: Vertical Limit
Author: hppjmxrgosg
Summary: Summary: Danny Fenton is not okay. TM. Honestly? Just overall bad vibes. But he's doing his best. Making it work. And trying not to become fully dead in the process. The Justice League is very concerned. But it's actually their fault they got involved so take that one, Batman. John Constantine told them not to do the thing. They did it anyway.  Or, Danny gets summoned by the League, and he actually kind of adopts them in the process. Because these big city heroes don't know anything about ghosts and who is he if he doesn't help them out? Besides, the Watchtower is in space. Danny's always wanted to go to space...  (I'm not really following any specific JL timeline, so like. Be prepared for 98% of everything to be *made up* and possibly *not real*.) Podfic available by ChaosKiro, linked under works inspired by this one at the very end of this work!

Title: video message incoming
Author: helenabertinellis
Summary: Summary: The League are just wrapping up their meeting when a call comes through the Watchtower servers. It's for Batman.

Title: A Meditation on Railroading
Author: eggmacguffin
Summary: Summary: When he ends up ditched in Atlanta after a fight with his dad, Tim decides to do the only sensible thing: Tell no one and make the 800 mile journey back to Gotham on his own. Because the "call Batman when you're in trouble" rule only applies when he's Robin, right?

Summary: Summary: Bruce's habit of collecting strays is not limited by dimension. Title: No Charm Equal

One not caught in the flurry of her debut and end of her childhood. One with experience, a sense of responsibilityâ€“â€ â€œYouâ€™d have me shop the shelf rather than the dancefloor? Tell me, do you have someone in mind already? A spinster cousin? Has Lady Danbury tasked you with finding a match for a wallflower she has taken under her wing? How desperate is the girl?â€ or The Duke and Duchess of Hastings both come to London for the season. Their presence changes things.

Title: Ruin
Author: Sea_Dragonfly
Summary: Summary: â€œPerhaps you should take a seat,â€ said Violet. Colin wouldn't remember the details of what his mother told him next. He would remember her hand warm on his knee, her eyes wide with concern, her voice gentle as velvet. All of it in stark contrast to the devastating news she shared. Penelope was ruined.

Title: one time thing.
Author: bemusedbicycle
Summary: Summary: â€œKatherine,â€ he whispers, horrified. â€œHave you not had good sex?â€ A modern AU where Kate has not had good sex and Anthony, out of the goodness of his heart, decides to give her the good sex.

Title: A Promise Made In Haste
Author: WaterlilyRose
Summary: Summary: Tumblr Prompt: An AU where Anthony actually goes through with marrying Edwina and Kate actually goes back to India. And Anthony and Edwina (after maybe a year or so into their marriage--which is going miserably by the way) go to visit her in India.  Anthony looked at her for a long minute and then took in a deep breath. â€œFine.â€ He whispered. â€œAll right. No more lies. I have not lain with Edwina in the entire course of our marriage. I cannot. Because every time I close my eyesâ€¦â€ He actually did close his eyes and took in a breath as though he were lacking oxygen. â€œall I can see, all I can dream about is her. I thought it would stop. Once she left to go back to Indiaâ€¦ I thought it would go away. But it hasnâ€™t.â€ Anthony opened his eyes and the pain that stared back at Daphne stole her breath. â€œI married the wrong sister. You were right. I was wrong.â€ He dropped the quill he was still holding onto the desk. â€œSoâ€¦ what remedy, Duchess?â€  What would have happened if Edwina had not seen the truth?

Title: Tempting Scandal
Author: Stillpink
Summary: Summary: Penelope is an innocent, but her experiences as Lady Whistledown teach her that she has much to learn about what happens between men and women behind closed doors. Fortunately, she has a friend willing to teach her all she wishes to know. It all seems so simple...until Colin Bridgerton uncovers her plan. Friends with Benefits AU

Title: Best Laid Plans
Author: voiceoftime
Summary: Summary: A delay in the ballroom means Kate doesn't hear Anthony lay out his list of requirements for a wife. In turn, he doesn't ruin his chances with her. Even the best laid plans can fall apart when love interferes.

Title: Thus Will Shine The Dawn
Author: bluemountainbayou
Summary: Summary: There's been a string of attacks in Mayfair. When Penelope is the most recent victim, Colin Bridgerton is faced with a potential he had never considered. Losing her forever.

Summary: Summary: Different scenarios between many different characters and the reader. Enjoy.

Title: Tony's Little Black Book (Night in Front of the TV)

Summary: Summary: Tony DiNozzo's Black Book is ever full. These are just a few names of who might be in there.

Title: Raising Harry Collection

I was a bit surprised to get a response at all, but it seemed popular enough, so I've decided to collect the whole set of stories here for archive purposes. Prompting is closed for the time being, though I will continue to work on any unfilled prompts from December.

Title: The Darkling
Author: OffYourBird
Summary: Summary: When Buffyâ€™s quest to get Spike returned to her is fulfilled in an unexpected way, she finds herself in a complicated relationship with an intrigued master vampire who isnâ€™t the man she loves, but who might be somedayâ€¦ if she can convince him to step out of the dark.

Title: Every Letter That You Write Me
Author: othellia
Summary: Summary: In a world where soulmates have the ability to write on each other's skin, Spike finds himself shackled to a five-year-old Buffy, who (for once) listens to her mother's advice about not handing out personal information. When Spike finally arrives in Sunnydale and discovers his soulmate is none other than the Slayer, he revels in the notion of a destined death match, but the Powers That Be have other plans...

Summary: Summary: Buffy's back from the grave and finding that being alive - yet again - really isn't all it's cracked up to be. In fact, she'd like a refund. No, really; she could use the money.

Title: The Bookshop

Title: if the heavens ever did speak

"Wheels up in twenty," he says, and sweeps from the room. As the others pack up and start to follow Hotchâ€™s lead, Derekâ€™s gaze is drawn, almost magnetically, to Spencer Reidâ€™s photograph that dominates almost a third of the television screen. He pushes the sensation away, and goes to get ready for a flight to Vegas. // Or, the soulmate!AU in which Reid works for the CIA instead.

Title: Reunion
Author: JustJasper

Title: Midnight Meetings

Summary: Summary: Fran's first meeting with her son's lover doesn't go exactly as planned. For starters, she didn't even know he had one.

Title: Evidently Unaware
Author: travelinthedark
Summary: Summary: â€œSo,â€ Reid says, eyeing Hotch warily, â€œIâ€™m going to leave you here to freak out as you slowly realize that weâ€™ve been dating for a while and you just didnâ€™t know it.â€ Featuring oblivious!Hotch and aggressive!Reid.

Title: Nice Earrings Agent Todd
Author: wolfpawn
Summary: Summary: Done for a prompt. Agent Todd is with the team while JJ is on maternity leave. She has her eye on the delectable Derek Morgan. The only problem is she is oblivious to the fact that the man is taken, and has annoyed the resident genius with her behaviour.

Title: Colors
Author: orangememesicle
Summary: Summary: But he can talk (almost all the time), feed himself (although he hangs a sign on his bathroom door prompting him to make himself dinner), and work like a functional adult. (He doesnâ€™t need to ask for accommodations. Heâ€™ll be Just Fine.)

Title: Dumb and Ditzy
Author: TimelessTears
Summary: Summary: AU. Years of being bullied for his smarts left him dreading when people figured out he was a genius. What better way to throw them off then by acting stupid? Enter: Dumb Blond Spencer Reid.

Title: Chain Reaction
Author: EloquentDossier
Summary: Summary: "(Mon 12:20 pm) Which is why you text the stranger instead of talk to coworkers.  (Mon 12:20 pm) Yes. (Mon 12:28 pm) Is that weird?" xxx A dialogue-only AU in which Hotch texts what he thinks is Rossi's new number but is actually the slightly eccentric stranger whom Hotch knows only as "Spencer." What follows is something neither man could have ever quite expected.

Title: Only Interpretations
Author: cjr2
Summary: Summary: A new case lands on the BAU's desk in which the victims all have a connection to Spencer Reid. Reid works the case in a desperate hope that he can solve it without revealing his connection to the victims, a connection he fears might ruin his relationship with the members of his team. Will the team be able to stop the killer in time when Reid's past comes back to haunt him?

Title: A Different Kind of Mask
Author: aloneintherain
Summary: Summary: â€œSo, you remember the plan, right?â€ Matt whispered. The sirens in the distance picked up, the sounds of the police officers on foot growing louder. â€œYouâ€™re blind and Iâ€™m just a scared teenager,â€ Peter said back, nodding. â€œGot it.â€

Title: Double Blind
Author: smilebackwards
Summary: Summary: Matt comes to, flat on his back, with Iron Man and Hawkeye hovering over him. â€œOh fuck,â€ Stark says, less than comfortingly.

Title: None So Blind
Author: prettybirdy979
Summary: Summary: They say when you assume you make an ass of you and me. Matt wishes that the Avenger's assumptions about his seeming inability to read the written word did something as benign as making an ass of him and them. Being called illiterate shouldn't hurt, not when he knows he's not, and it's not like he can tell them the truth. Not that the truth would make much difference. He's just going to have to grin and bear it. If he can.

Title: Look the Devil in the Face
Author: prettybirdy979
Summary: Summary: It's increasingly becoming a world where the unbelievable happens every day. The Avengers team includes a defrosted World War Two solider, a giant green rage monster and a man who might be a God; and they battle aliens and magic on a regular basis. It's not too far fetched to believe the Devil walks Hell's Kitchen. Matt, on the other hand, hasn't realised exactly why his new battle buddies seem terrified of him. It's not like they've even heard the rumors about him being the Devil... right?

Title: How (Not) to Meet New People
Author: aloneintherain
Summary: Summary: â€œWhy is there a teenager in our office?â€ Foggy stood in the threshold of the office, mouth slightly agape, most likely wondering if heâ€™d walked into the wrong building. The kid waved at him, smile huge under a blooming black eye and spilt lip. â€œFoggy,â€ Matt said, far too calm for someone who was in the presence of a beaten, bloodied, teenage stranger. â€œThis is Peter.â€

Title: Take All The Courage
Author: prettybirdy979
Summary: Summary: When what should have been a straight forward mission in Hell's Kitchen goes pear shaped due to lack of communication, teaching his teammates sign language seems like a logical step to Clint. Communication when their comms are down - great plan! And including the local vigilante, who's been working closely with them on this, is a real no-brainer. Until it turns out said vigilante is an asshole that thinks sign language is beneath him, judging by the way he's stubbornly refusing to learn it. (Conversely - Matt's trying, he really is but damn it, those two signs are exactly the same... what do you mean they mean completely different things?!)

Title: Making Sense of Chaos
Author: SparkedToLife
Summary: Summary: Spider-Man always hit the attempted rapists the hardest. This was not due to some kind of personal connection. It wasn't.

Title: Death Before Inaction
Author: hppjmxrgosg
Summary: Summary: â€œFuck off, Nicky.â€ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ â€œHasnâ€™t anyone ever told you spider-napping is illegal?â€ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ â€œYou canâ€™t hold me here, I know my spider-rights.â€ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ â€œGod, you guys are so old. What are you? Like 27?â€ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ â€œScale of 1 to 10, how upset would you be if I told you I banged your mom?â€ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  Or, I got my grubby little hands on the spider-man time line and fucked around a little bit. Not much (everything) changes.

Title: Encounters
Author: Sonora
Summary: Summary: Matt's not nearly as curious about the Avengers as they are about him. (Yup, it's another Matt-meets-the-team fic)

Title: Thorns for Flowers
Author: Valkirin
Summary: Summary: Hawkeye don't mind working with Daredevil, really. He's a good guy to know and clearly cares about Hell's Kitchen. Clint Barton would like Daredevil better if the guy was a little less ableist about Clint's hearing loss.

Title: Hear My Voice (When I Cry Out Loud)
Author: QuackTracks
Summary: Summary: â€œWelcome to the University of Central Florida Knights. Iâ€™m Ava Sharpe, your captain and, lucky for us both, your RA. You seem like the kind of person to need to be kept in line.â€ Or, â€œSara grudgingly accepts her scholarship to play soccer at UCF, and Captain Ava Sharpe is a massive pain in her ass.â€

Title: You're My Miracle
Author: bihexualmess
Summary: Summary: "Sara Lance is a reckless person. She exhibits violent behaviours, and drinks while on a job. Oh, and did you know she sleeps with her clients? Clients, Rip! She sleeps with them! Who does that?!" Rip chuckled as he turned his eyes towards the door. "I take it she isn't a fan of mine then?" Ava froze when she heard a voice behind her. OR Ava is an FBI agent and is forced to work with Sara, a private investigator, as a consultant.

Title: Marvel and DC Reader Stories
Author: thewitchandtheassassin
Summary: Summary: A series of drabbles, one shots, or short series involving DC and Marvel Characters and a reader. Prompts and ideas are always welcome. This is my first time writing things like this so go easy on me, friends. Disclaimer: I own nothing.

Title: Tony's Little Black Book (Night in Front of the TV)
Author: hellbells
Summary: Summary: Tony DiNozzo's Black Book is ever full. These are just a few names of who might be in there.

Title: you make me smile (please stay for a while now)
Author: CoffeeAndArrows
Summary: Summary: "Something about Ava's small smile, about the comforting warmth of her beside Sara, the familiarity of wandering to class together, the way she didnâ€™t seem to look at Sara as though she expected anything, expecting a way of acting and being and reacting, as though Sara didnâ€™t owe her anything. For the first time since sheâ€™d walked into school earlier that morning, Sara felt like she could breathe. Maybe, just maybe, this year wasnâ€™t off to an entirely bad start." OR sara and ava have been rivals throughout high school, but now it's senior year and suddenly everything about their lives are changing before their eyes, and their rivalry is no exception. a hsau filled with your favourite fic tropes, including unwittingly becoming best friends bordering on girlfriends, everyone else betting on their potential relationship, endless group chats, and a whole lot of angst and softness.

Title: Lights Off
Author: Crimson1
Summary: Summary: â€œWhat if our feet touch?â€ A pause. Barry felt his face heat up, beet red in the blackness, expecting Snart to laugh at him, and pulled the covers up to his neck so he could hide his entire face if need be. He felt Snart settle more comfortably into the bed. â€œIf our feet touch, we fuck. Obviously.â€

Title: I See My Future In Your Eyes
Author: lizardwriter
Summary: Summary: Sara's relatively new to school, but already she is THE cool kid that everyone wants to be with. Everyone except Ava, who is much more interested in making sure she secures the spot of Valedictorian in their graduating class and that she survives her physics group project with her GPA intact. So of course, Mr. Stein pairs her to work with Sara. Except, maybe Sara's not so bad. And maybe, as her best friend, Amaya, has pointed out, making meaningful connections with people is actually an important part of life.

Title: Nothing Like a Secret So Well Kept
Author: Regann
Summary: Summary: Even if he doesn't want to admit it, it's obvious (to just about everyone) that Len has a crush on the Flash. (Or, Five people who are amused by Leonardâ€™s crush on Barry and one who finds it to be very serious business.)

Title: biding our time (until tomorrow)
Author: TheTruthAboutLove
Summary: Summary: [...] â€œAbout that,â€ Ava said, walking to her desk to grab the other letter. â€œIf he makes it past the New Year, it won't matter if a Major or a Colonel older than me runs. I'll be appointed General, soon.â€ Nate gasped at that and his eyes lit up. â€œYou cannot possibly lose. The only other candidate that might get in your way-â€ his shoulders slumped a little. â€œColonel Diggle. He does have one advantage that might allure to people more than your rank. He's married, on the family way.â€ Both Rip and Lance sighed, shaking their heads. Ava frowned. â€œThat is easily fixed,â€ Nate amended. OR, a past!AU where Ava is a Colonel who wants to be elected Governor, but to do so she has to marry quickly, and who better suited than the daughter of her Captain, Quentin Lance? Except, things get a lot more complicated than that.

Title: The Immaculate Barry Allen
Author: Crimson1
Summary: Summary: Barry is cursed to lose his powers until he loses his virginity. Sounds like a job for Captain Cold. OR AU with everything being the same except no Earth-2 or Zoom, just normal Flash business Barry has been dealing with since the Singularity. Legends still happened, and Len was found soon after the Oculus explosion adrift in time, and is now â€˜on leaveâ€™. To pass the time, heâ€™s decided to get back to his roots by robbing a few places. Barry is not amused. Heâ€™s also a virgin. But no oneâ€™s supposed to know that. Except that the meta of the week (or witch? Barry doesnâ€™t even know) seems to be able to look right into his soul and see that heâ€™s never had sex. She also thinks itâ€™s funny, apparently, to curse him to lose his powers until he does something about it. Enter Snart. Which is definitely a very bad (very good?) idea.

Title: Dark Matter
Author: mysterycyclone
Summary: Summary: The last thing Peter sees is Tony's horrified, heartbroken expression leaning over him. The guilt in his eyes is almost worse than the burning pain that's taking Peter apart piece by piece. The world starts to go dark. There's a flash of gold and green. For one moment, he finds himself standing amongst the Guardians and others. And then darkness again. It feels like blinking; an extended period of nothingness that ends as abruptly as it begins. One moment thereâ€™s nothing, the next thereâ€™s light. â€œEasy,â€ a woman says. Her words are gentle, and carry a slight accent that he canâ€™t place. "I'm called Wonder Woman. What's your name?"

Title: Batcellanea
Author: envysparkler
Summary: Summary: A collection of outtakes, alternate POVs, and missing scenes from my existing work. 188-221. whumptober fills.

Title: the bat's nest
Author: helenabertinellis
Summary: Summary: The Justice League knew that Batman didn't trust anyone; they also knew that they were probably the closest he got. Aside from them, Batman worked alone. At least... they thought they knew that. Then they met his kids.

Title: Take Care of Business
Author: TheResurrectionist
Summary: Summary: Summary: Bruce has a conference call with Wayne Enterprises. Having it at the Manor was, in hindsight, a really shitty idea. â€œI donâ€™t have your phone!â€ The two boys began trading hits, yelling at the top of their lungs. Bruce turned back to the webcam just as Damian leapt on top of Timâ€™s back, a high-pitched battle cry torn from his lips. â€œMr. Hodges,â€ he said cheerfully, unflinching as Tim threw Damian into the wet bar sink. â€œHave you had a chance to examine the chart I pointed out?â€ Inspired by this viral video and Batwaynemanâ€™s post on tumblr.

Title: Bus to Nowhere
Author: foldingfacets
Summary: Summary: Is it running from your problems if your problems consider you to be a dead imprint of consciousness that killed their son? Yes, but Danny tries not to think about how his nightmares of his parents trying to kill him came true when they found out he was Phantom. After being on the run from his parents and the government for a couple of months, moving from town to town, Danny ends up in Gotham City and decides to risk staying in Batman's territory. He'd take the wrath of Batman over live vivisection via beloved parents or being studied and torn apart by the government. Besides, he's not a meta. Being dead is a medical condition.

Title: Watch This
Author: snackbaskets
Summary: Summary: Hal and Barry are worried about Batman's new partner. Being around the Batman all the time can't be good for a kid, right? Robin insists otherwise, and for $15.36 of betting money, is happy to demonstrate.

Title: Vertical Limit
Author: hppjmxrgosg
Summary: Summary: Danny Fenton is not okay. TM. Honestly? Just overall bad vibes. But he's doing his best. Making it work. And trying not to become fully dead in the process. The Justice League is very concerned. But it's actually their fault they got involved so take that one, Batman. John Constantine told them not to do the thing. They did it anyway.  Or, Danny gets summoned by the League, and he actually kind of adopts them in the process. Because these big city heroes don't know anything about ghosts and who is he if he doesn't help them out? Besides, the Watchtower is in space. Danny's always wanted to go to space...  (I'm not really following any specific JL timeline, so like. Be prepared for 98% of everything to be *made up* and possibly *not real*.) Podfic available by ChaosKiro, linked under works inspired by this one at the very end of this work!

Title: video message incoming
Author: helenabertinellis
Summary: Summary: The League are just wrapping up their meeting when a call comes through the Watchtower servers. It's for Batman.

Title: A Meditation on Railroading
Author: eggmacguffin
Summary: Summary: When he ends up ditched in Atlanta after a fight with his dad, Tim decides to do the only sensible thing: Tell no one and make the 800 mile journey back to Gotham on his own. Because the "call Batman when you're in trouble" rule only applies when he's Robin, right?

Title: i blinked (and there you were)
Author: Della19
Summary: Summary: The Weeping Angels, Eggsy reads on the stolen Torchwood intel. Aliens that pose as statues, and kill their victims by sending them back in time and feeding off their years not lived in the present. The politest psychopaths in the universe, a note reads, scrawled in what looks like a doctorâ€™s chicken scratch on the edge of the page by someone who clearly had a perverse sense of humour. A one way trip, the report concludes; you get transported by the angels, and itâ€™s the slow road back to the present for you. Eggsy lays his head back on the wall, takes stock of his situation. Heâ€™s lost 30 years - three years more than his entire lifespan up â€™til now - in the blink of an eye, and now heâ€™s stuck here, in 1988. Three years before heâ€™s even born. Arthur, the prick, is sure to be heading up the Kingsmen, and Merlin, if heâ€™s even there would beâ€¦20, maybe. Fuck, so fucking young. Shite, even Harryâ€™d only beâ€¦ Alive, Eggsy thinks, and finds himself sitting down hard from where his knees canâ€™t hold him. This is 1988, and Harryâ€™s 23, and alive. Suddenly, being stuck in 1988 doesnâ€™t seem so bad. Or, the one where love means changing the future. Harry/Eggsy, Time Travel Fix-It.

Title: The Boy Who Waited
Author: Lunik
Summary: Summary: In a world without stars, the Last Centurion loses the Pandorica, loses his charge and loses his mind. SHIELD takes a chance on hiring a mysterious amnesiac man, and Agent Coulson finds that Rory Williams is the best damn secretary he's ever had.

Title: Scratching the Itch
Author: bendingsignpost
Summary: Summary: Her mum had always told her that blokes had only one thing on their minds, but this was taking it to an entirely new level.

Title: Alien Taskforce
Author: TheSovereigntyofReality
Summary: Summary: Just because S.H.I.E.L.D. and the Avengers didn't listen to Tony after the Battle of New York, it doesn't mean no one did.

Title: My Fandom Needs Me
Author: orphan_account
Summary: Summary: From immortal dragon riders to the classic best-friends-to-lovers trope, this work has it all. This is a collection of XReader One-Shots from multiple (probably too many) fandoms also posted on my Tumblr. Fluff, angst, and a shit ton of references! Links for prompts, some rules for requests, and a list of my current requests can be found in the first chapter. More relationships will be added as chapters are added. All the relationships I've written for are also in the tags. Rated T for language, violence, and character death. (This collection is completed, but I'm still writing one-shots! I post them here and on my Tumblr, @generallynerdy.)

Title: Sexy Times For Every Fandom
Author: redlipstickblackdress
Summary: Summary: Different scenarios between many different characters and the reader. Enjoy.

Title: Connect-the-Dots
Author: fingersfallingupwards
Summary: Summary: Rose Tyler has a soul mark. The Doctor does not. Consequently, he knows where they stand. Then he regenerates on Christmas, and he suddenly doesn't know anything at all.

Title: The Care and Feeding of Tiny Humans (and slightly larger Time Lords)
Author: Netgirl_y2k
Summary: Summary: The one where the Doctor comes back for little Amelia Pond.

Title: Past Tense
Author: Try2CatchMe
Summary: Summary: "This grin was brand new. It promised danger and excitement and probably epic stupidity under the guise of genius, but most of all it promised fun in the midst of it."

Summary: Summary: Tony has a type ... and it tends towards the heroic. Here are just a few entries that may appear in his black book.

Title: The Demons Have the Phonebox

Summary: Summary: Soho, London, 2019. A man with a blue box has vanished. An angel has been taken from a bookshop. And two redheads are joining forces to get them back.

Title: The Pond Continuum
Author: kaydeefalls
Summary: Summary: Five people who have never heard of the Ponds (but might have met them anyway), and one who has.

Title: here is the deepest secret nobody knows
Author: blackkat
Summary: Summary: Ianto closes his eyes in Thames House, lungs full of choking alien gas, and opens them in his sister's house in Cardiff.

Title: Past Tense
Author: Try2CatchMe
Summary: Summary: "This grin was brand new. It promised danger and excitement and probably epic stupidity under the guise of genius, but most of all it promised fun in the midst of it."

Title: Locked Room Puzzle
Author: Speranza
Summary: Summary: "Aileen," Musky said finally, with the air of someone imparting great wisdom, "if you ever have a case gives you the stinkeye, one of the finest policemen in all the world lives not twenty miles past Miller's Hill."

Title: Academic Punk
Author: thehoyden
Summary: Summary: "What the hell is this, an Austen novel?"

Title: Eight Sessions
Author: Speranza
Summary: Summary: "I first came to Chicago on the trail of the killers of my father--" Berger grabbed for his notebook and began scribbling. Killers of my father... geez, there might be a paper in this.

Title: Sweet Confessions Underneath His Tongue
Author: thehoyden
Summary: Summary: It was like a car wreck, really. You just couldn't look away. And Fraser looked up at Ray, with his expression like the cold fury of God.

Title: Where the Story Changes
Author: seperis
Summary: Summary: It's why he could sit in the middle of a camp of Mounties, eating a bowl of God-is-this-polar-bear-stew and say, hey, buddy, got an idea. Let's go get that Hand of Franklin. I cannot think of anything more unlikely, so I'm pretty sure we'll find it.

Title: Ping
Author: Speranza
Summary: Summary: I am not the only person here who wants a do-over.

Title: Chicago's Most Wanted
Author: Speranza
Summary: Summary: "Of course he got the money--he's Fraser, he's organized, he's a fucking criminal mastermind, what do you think?!"

Title: The penny jar theory
Author: Deputychairman
Summary: Summary: â€œHow - â€ Fraser cleared his throat. â€œHow long is the contract?â€ â€œSix months,â€ Ray told the stew. â€œAnd will you,â€ he stopped. Ray heard the deep breath he took. Taking it on the chin, attaboy, Ben. â€œAre you planning to come back here, afterwards?â€

Title: Nanuk's Complete Collection of Fanart
Author: nanuk_dain
Summary: Summary: This is the place where all my artwork is gathered, sorted by fandom and pairing. Let's just say, it's a huge amount of fandoms and pairings, you'll probably find something you'll like ^^ Enjoy! UPDATE: Seven new manips added: - Chapter 19: [Avengers/MCU] JARVIS/Sir/Happy-Moments/Instance-35004 (Steve/Tony) - Chapter 34: [Avengers/MCU] Five Times Tony Comforts Steve: 1 - I've Got You (Steve/Tony) - Chapter 35: [Avengers/MCU] Five Times Tony Comforts Steve: 2 - Get Better Soon (Steve/Tony) - Chapter 36: [Avengers/MCU] Five Times Tony Comforts Steve: 3 - Just Keep Going (Steve/Tony) - Chapter 37: [Avengers/MCU] Five Times Tony Comforts Steve: 4 - We Can Do It (Steve/Tony) - Chapter 38: [Avengers/MCU] Five Times Tony Comforts Steve: 5 - Just Hold On To Me (Steve/Tony) - Chapter 39: [Avengers/MCU] Five Times Tony Comforts Steve: +1 - I'm Always Here For You (Steve/Tony) IMPORTANT NOTE - UPDATE: So I wrangled with my Livejournal account, but some of my art links are still randomly replaced with an 18+ notice - if you click on them, you can see the pic, though. Anyone knows a good image hosting service that'll allow my stuff? Guess it's time to move from LJ...

Title: An Admirable Solution
Author: Speranza
Summary: Summary: Having sex with Fraser was great, but it was still kind of like being punched out by an orgasm. Which was kind of fun, but ow.

Title: diving blind
Author: yukla
Fandom: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier (TV)

Author: M0thpunk
Summary: Summary: Madeleine was always taught that The Divine loved everybody. That they would accept every living thing with open arms. He believed that they were good and just, with no room in their hearts for hatred for anything. That is, until he fell in love with a man. (Fun fact I almost named this fic Take Me To Church but I thought that would be too "closeted gay high schooler" for my 21 year old ass)

Title: I'd Trade My Life for Yours
Author: grayimperia
Summary: Summary: [Major spoilers for all of V3] Her classmates have just chosen Saihara as the killer by a margin of one. He finally reaches out to her, and she looks back at him. And Monokuma says something that absolutely shocks both of them to the core. â€œWelp! Looks like you guys got it right!â€ Kaedeâ€™s world stops. - Three different sacrifices are made, and three different survivors stumble out of the rubble.

Title: And Again
Author: Riona
Summary: Summary: Naegi finds himself caught in a time loop. Surely living through Monobear's game once was bad enough?

Title: Let It All Out
Author: taitofan
Summary: Summary: The misadventures of Kokichi Ouma wetting himself in front of the boys (and sometimes girls) he likes. Ships featured include: Shuuichi, Kiibo, Rantarou, Kaito, Gonta, Korekiyo, Miu, Kaede; Nagito, Kirumi, Tenko, Ryouma, and crossovers. Latest chapter: Merry Christmas, Kokichi is a pirate now [The fics are unrelated unless noted and new tags will be added as each chapter goes up]

Title: Reaching
Author: kokichiouma
Summary: Summary: Even if that hand reaches out to him, Ouma won't pull it, or let himself be pulled. A helping hand is useless if the person being helped spurns it. The loop continues again.

Title: Three-Point Shot
Author: RandomRex6
Summary: Summary: The first investigation was going exactly as the Mastermind hoped it would. And then Ouma picked up the ball. MAJOR V3 SPOILERS (Sort of Fix-It; Justice is Served AU) TV Tropes: http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Fanfic/ThreePointShot In-Progress Audiobook by Net Neutrality: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLK2BZXDp6Lqhr9zimdHWTmQpu21y2cBaw In-Progress Audiobook by ARedgrave: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bNSAzcWUerU

Title: The Lion's Den
Author: Arcawolf
Summary: Summary: After the Killing Game, Komaeda realizes he has no choice but to bring the Ultimate Hope under his care. The world has become a very dangerous place after all, and there's no way he can allow Naegi Makoto's light to blink out. (Komaeda decides to shelter/adopt/kidnap a terrified Naegi, and Ultimate Despair is a poor host) Only follows canon from the first game.

Title: Intertwined feelings
Author: AtroceIronie
Summary: Summary: Not long after the first trial, Hinata wakes up only to discover that Komaeda and himself are connected through pain ; if one of them is injured, the other will feel it. What if, as their relationship grow, they started sharing more and more than just pain ? Maybe it could be the chance for Hinata to understand the elusive mess that is Komaeda's mind.

Title: i can't take you anywhere
Author: dimolto
Summary: Summary: â€œOne more word and Iâ€™m going to drive us both off a cliff,â€ Hinata deadpanned. â€œWell, I would probably survive it. Ultimate Lucky Student and all.â€ Komaeda tilted his head. â€œBut if you really do want to kill me, Iâ€™m sure we can find a way to make it happen!â€ On the way back from the third-year class trip to Hokkaido, the bus happened to leave two students behind: a tag-along Reserve Course boy who, as always, wasnâ€™t quite sure how he kept getting himself into these situations, and an enigmatic young man who was beginning to feel very, very cheated by his luck. Now, if Hajime Hinata wants to get back to Tokyo, heâ€™s going to have to face a hotwired car, 900 miles of open road, and ten days stuck with Nagito Komaeda.

Title: cops and robbers
Author: andreabandrea
Summary: Summary: â€œDarling?â€ Kokichi snorted. â€œYou love me that much, Shuichi?â€ â€œWellâ€¦ yeah,â€ Shuichi said, giving a light laugh. â€œThatâ€™s why I married you.â€ And he froze. [Kokichi wins the Key of Love at the casino. He wakes up in Shuichiâ€™s ideal fantasy. ]

Title: Affinity
Author: Nyx_xy
Summary: Summary: Hinata and Kamukura both feel it, the swell of affection. Komaeda seems to be the only individual on the island able to always tell the two apart, even while they wear the same face. The others speculate, but are never as assure in their switch as the one before them now. Hajime can feel Izuru almost purr under the acknowledgment. He internally rolls his eyes. Why does he call you by first name and not me, anyways? Are you jealous? Smug bastard.

Title: And Again
Author: Riona
Summary: Summary: Naegi finds himself caught in a time loop. Surely living through Monobear's game once was bad enough?

Title: Reaching
Author: kokichiouma
Summary: Summary: Even if that hand reaches out to him, Ouma won't pull it, or let himself be pulled. A helping hand is useless if the person being helped spurns it. The loop continues again.

Title: Affected
Author: Laurea
Summary: Summary: After being repeatedly challenged by Naegi in the class trials, Togami finds his mind unduly focused on the boy. He thinks Naegi should be equally focused on him - but his plan doesn't go quite the way he expects. His miscalculation affects not only himself, but the entire course of the killing game. Usually updates every other Sunday.

Title: Extra Life
Author: The_Apocryphal_One
Summary: Summary: Izuru knew he couldn't let her die, not like this, not while he had the power to save her. Chiaki survives her executionâ€”but the fate of the world is still sealed. The road to recovery is a hard one, and a reunion is far off. TvTropes page is here, including links to all translations (Russian, French, Spanish, and Chinese), the infomercial, and the audio reading; feel free to add to it! http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Fanfic/ExtraLife

Title: Remember Me
Author: Laurea
Summary: Summary: When the Future Foundation helps the students begin to recover their lost memories, Byakuya Togami is horrified to discover that his feelings for Makoto Naegi are not what he thought they were.

Title: And There Was Only One Bed One-Shots
Author: Princess_Piggles
Summary: Summary: Collection of bedsharing fics for danganronpa characters, requests are now closed. Thank you! 1 Saiouma 2 Kokichi/Mukuro 3 Tenmiko 4 komahina 5 Maki/Kaede 6 Toko/Hajime 7 Miu/Kokichi 8 sonianami 9 Nagisa/Masaru 10 Kyoko/Makoto 11 Nagito/Chiaki 12 Chihiro/Kokichi 13 Keebo/Shuichi 14 fuyupeko 15 Kaede/Kokichi 16 maki/kaito 17 Gonta/Shuichi 18 oumota 19 kiibouma 20 Miu/Chihiro 21 Tenko/trans!Kokichi 22 Fuyuhiko/Kokichi 23 Fuyuhiko/Kazuichi 24 Mikan/Tenko 25 Akane/Chihiro 26 Maki/Kokichi 27 Junko/Monaca 28 Miu/Makoto 29 Gonta/Kokichi 30 Ryoma/Kirumi 31 Miu/Kaito 32 Miu/Nagisa 33 Kazuichi/Sonia 34 Chihiro/Hina 35 Kaede/Shuichi 36 Celeste/Chihiro 37 Gonta/Chihiro 38 Mukuro/Shuichi 39 Rantaro/Miu 40 Korekiyo&Sister/Toko&Sho 41 junkomaeda 42 Chiaki/Mikan 43 Kaede/Miu 44 Kaito/trans!kokichi 45 komamiki 46 oumeno 47 korekiyo/kokichi 48 saimota 49 chimondo

Title: White Like Snow
Author: FallFromtheStars
Summary: Summary: Hinata Hajime is a stressed university student with no purpose in life. Lost in his thoughts, he ends up feeding a white fox who ends up changing his life. (Kitsune au because I love Kitsune Komaeda)

Title: Dangan Ronpa: Third Base
Author: BardsAmbrosia
Summary: Summary: Indulgent, nasty trash for the danganronpa community.

Title: Instructions Not Included
Author: Vinci
Summary: Summary: Logically, Connor should have noticed something was different after the moment of his deviancy, after he consciously chose not to shoot Markus, but he truly didnâ€™t notice it until months later, as he watched, in absolute interest, as Hank typed something on his computer across from him at his desk. Or: In which Connor simultaneously experiences an emotional and sexual awakening in the wake of his deviancy and handles it in the best way he can. By not telling anyone.

Title: Fuck pride (pride only hurts, it never helps)
Author: ImogenGotDrunk
Summary: Summary: After the android uprising, Connor becomes a permanent fixture in the DPD. Thatâ€™s fine. Gavin can accept that. The dipshitâ€™s more human than he used to be, and a decent detective to boot. Gavin can deal with him being around. What Gavin cannot deal with is Connorâ€™s replica; prissy, cold-eyed, and with a mouth that Gavin doesnâ€™t know whether to punch or take between his teeth. The RK900 model has been assigned as his partner for the foreseeable future. - Now with a little timestamps series.

Title: Deviant Behavior
Author: Precursor
Summary: Summary: Youâ€™ve complained about walking the beat in Detroit for years. Petty crimes, protests, no real action... So when Captain Fowler gave you orders to respond to a hostage situation, you couldnâ€™t resist. And then you got shot, only to be saved by the android sent by CyberLifeâ€¦ â€¢ 78 chapters, ~215k words not including notes. â€¢ See notes for Discord invite, socials, and series info. Betaâ€™d by MjrGenMatt, ElegantN7, Celestielle and Cerulaine

Title: Halcyon
Author: Terminallydepraved
Summary: Summary: Hank gave in to the urge to bury his face in his hands. This was justâ€¦ Fuck, he was too innocent looking. Those wide eyes, the soft looking lips. He stared at Hank like he hung the sun and stars, and here Hank was, projecting. Again. Something brushed his shoulder and Hank couldnâ€™t help but jump. He flinched away and moved his hands, but it was just Connor. It was always just Connor, standing a little too close, probing when Hank was at his worst. Standing at his side with worry in his eyes, staring up at him, andâ€¦ Fuck. He was too old for this. He was too old and broken and fucked up to deserve this, but Connor made it too easy to want it anyway.

Title: learning curve
Author: Yuu_chi
Summary: Summary: â€œWhile sexual activity is not my default purpose, I do possess the capability,â€ Connor says without so much as batting an eye, unaware that heâ€™s completely shattered Hankâ€™s world view in one single sentence.

Title: Identity Crisis
Author: BrickSheep
Summary: Summary: A series of short stories focusing on Connor's new insecurities and the people around him who help calm them. Spoilers guaranteed.

Title: Android in a Strange Land
Author: RK7200
Summary: Summary: Connor isn't where he supposed to be. Out of both time and place. He's now stuck in a time with no androids other than himself. And he has a sneaking suspicion that this might not even be in his universe. However, that mystery can be solved at another time. Right now, he has to go home and not get discovered by the humans. And absolutely do not get attached to the resident Hank, who is apparently his employer, Tony Stark, with alcoholism and tragic backstories abound. Too bad that he's going to get attached anyways.

Title: Possibility
Author: SpicyReyes
Summary: Summary: Connor was not designed for domestic tasks, but he has to be useful somehow. He just has to.

Title: machine learning
Author: kriegersan
Summary: Summary: â€œThis kinda shit doesnâ€™t go away overnight. Itâ€™s only been a few months, Connor. Weâ€™re only just starting to know what this is gonna look like.â€ Lt. Anderson throws back his beer. â€œYou think I donâ€™t know that?â€ He sounds defensive. He tempers his voice. â€œIâ€™m simply processing.â€ â€œTell me about it-- Iâ€™m processing, too.â€ (2039. After the revolution.)

Title: march of progress
Author: Calamitatum
Summary: Summary: Connor could fill a book with the things he doesn't know. One of Hankâ€™s big, thick paperbacks, pages worn with age, covers creased and coffee-stained. "What?" Hank grouses once, when he catches him looking. "Theyâ€™re well-loved, at least." Connor looks at himself, smooth plastic and pressed clothes. No creases, no stains.

Title: A What If
Author: GreyTail
Summary: Summary: A random assortment of one-shots, AUs, and ideas I have for the My Hero Universe. Updates sporadically (ie, when I get a random burst of inspiration) Anyone is welcome to use these ideas or quirks in their own fics. Just let me know so I can read 'em! And if any chapters gain a big following, I may just make them a full fic or an Extended;) Come shout at me on the Discord.

Author: Lexsssu
Summary: Summary: â•”â•â•â•*.Â·:Â·.â˜½âœ§ âœ¦ âœ§â˜¾.Â·:Â·.*â•â•â•â•— In which YOU who bears the name of [Lucifiel] for your in-game avatar in [YGGDRASIL] are transported to various worlds aside from the [New World]. â•šâ•â•â•*.Â·:Â·.â˜½âœ§ âœ¦ âœ§â˜¾.Â·:Â·.*â•â•â•â• How do you fare in these other worlds with no one but yourself to rely on? Can they conquer the bane of [YGGDRASIL], the Fell Dragon herself or will she be the one conquering them?

Title: Rebirth
Author: TheWritingSquid
Summary: Summary: When Vergil returns to the human world with his ever-infuriating brother, he discovers how much he's yet to learn. From the meaning of "touchscreen" to how one even begins to be a father, this new life has its share of challenges to face. Yet as he tries to build a new future for himself, a strange upsurge of demons in familiar black sludge reminds him his past is never far behind. -- A mix of epic action storyline and That Good Domestic Shit with most of the DMC cast ~

Title: Devil May Have Fun
Author: arlene28
Summary: Summary: A collection (once i've written them all) of sex scenes between you (the reader) and the twins from devil may cry. All short stories. Pure smut. Pretty much just sex scenes that i thought up but didn't have a place to put them in my longer stories.  I will take any requests for any fandom except underage requests.

Title: Marriage Law Rejection Letters
Author: sakura_lisel
Summary: Summary: When the Ministry of Magic enacts a Marriage Law some time after the final battle against Voldemort, this is the reaction from most of the population whoâ€™s against the idea. (The Marriage Law Rejection Letters can also be found over at fanfiction.net under the author name Sakura Lisel.) Taking submissions for letters for anyone who wants to do one.

Title: Ebony and Ivory
Author: SpiritChilde
Summary: Summary: You are born of the Void, a place so cold and dark one cannot seem to comprehend it. Under orders from a mysterious Deity, you are brought to Red Grave city on a mission to fix the chaos tearing everything apart. But higher powers are at play, and your destiny entwines with that of a black-haired, poetry-loving man on his own mission to put a stop to the Qliphoth's terror. Some inspiration taken from Dishonored.

Title: The Devil's Pact
Author: Synchron
Summary: Summary: To call what the two of you have 'friends with benefits' would only be half right. You aren't really friends. You just have the benefits.

Title: Return of a Legend
Author: lavender_demon (Lavender_Hearts)
Summary: Summary: (Spoilers for DMC5) When Dante gets a call from Trish saying that she's found something very personal hidden away in a ghost town, he has suspicions. But a demon that he, Vergil, and Nero never would have expected to find winds up rocking the very foundations of their world, and especially their family.

Title: Message Sent
Author: Aicosu
Summary: Summary: A wrong number turns into a torrid affair between strangers through texts.

Title: Looking Glass
Author: Feynite
Summary: Summary: She is tired. The world is ash and dust, and she has lost so many pieces of herself; markings and heart, left arm and left eye, trust and faith. It has become such a painful thing, to love him. And yet. And yet.

Title: Keeping Secrets
Author: ElvenSemi
Summary: Summary: Just another elf come to serve the Inquisition... That's what you hope to be, anyway. But you're an elf with a secret, and a little bit too much pride to just blend in peacefully.

Title: The Half-Life of Element Zero
Author: GraphiteGirl
Summary: Summary: After her discharge from the Alliance, Commander Helen Trevelyan joined the Andromeda Initiative, wanting to leave her personal tragedies and a psycho ex-boyfriend behind her. She expected to sleep for 600 years, and wake up in a med bay. Instead, she crash-landed on a snow-covered mountain, ten-thousand years later. She is alone, confused, and dying from eezo radiation. And the only sign of civilization is an old church in the distance. A Post-Modern Girl on Thedas fic. Many, many thanks to my betas, Dreadlordcherrycake and Duinemerwen, who have advised me on all matters of lore, plausibility and verb tense. If it wasn't for them, this story would still be in cryo. Any mistakes are mine, not theirs. I have a regular work schedule IRL, which means I don't have a regular update schedule on AO3. This story is visually supported. I sometimes tumblr at https://unhealthynpcobsession.tumblr.com/ Bioware owns all/legal boilerplate/blah blah blah.

Title: As the World Falls Down
Author: Khirsah
Summary: Summary: For the kink meme prompt: Josephine holds an Orlesian-style ball at Skyhold and everyone is to attend masked and out of uniform. Trevelyan decides that this is the perfect time to blow off some steam without giving anyone reason to brag about having slept with the Herald of Andraste, so she finds a partner for some masked, inebriated, anonymous sex. Unfortunately, she didn't realize that her stressed out, buttoned-down Commander had the same idea...

Title: half the lies you tell aren't true
Author: radiophile
Summary: Summary: It takes a long, long time for Dorian to realize that he is still waiting for the Bull to finish what he started.

Title: A Whole New World
Author: RogueLioness
Summary: Summary: Samarra Bayart is a researcher, albeit one with a small Dragon Age obsession. So when she finds herself in Thedas, she's convinced she's in a dream... till she realizes she's not. Given the title of Oracle, she must carefully walk the line between using her knowledge of the game to guide the Inquisition, while protecting herself and her secrets. Can she put what she knows to get the best ending for the ones she cares for? Or will she crash and burn in the wolf's jaws? [Note: NSFW chapters will be marked with a *]

Title: Wicked Grace
Author: lyriumveins
Summary: Summary: Garrett Hawke is a simple guy. He likes simple things. Things like playing MMORPGs with his friends. Their guild, Wicked Grace, has been pretty exclusive for a while. But, when the guild becomes interested in recruiting a new member - an elven warrior named Fenris - what used to be a "fun way of passing time" becomes "Operation: Hard in Hightown" (or, as Isabela calls it, "Operation: Get Hawke Laid"). Needless to say, this operation is anything but simple.

Title: Ace in the Hole
Author: staircased
Summary: Summary: Hawke spends most of his time getting rich and getting drunk (not necessarily in that order) while playing cards in taverns. While away from Kirkwall, he ends up playing against an overly confident Danarius who bets his slave, Fenris, as the main prize. (AU with canon setting)

Title: Apotheosis
Author: KeeperLavellan
Summary: Summary: After Wisdom had gone, I hadnâ€™t been sure that Solas would ever return. In time, he did, offering no more explanation than to say, I could hardly abandon you now. Even then the word seemed to catch in my ear. Now. Maybe once before and perhaps one day soon, but not just yet. On that point I had no illusions. Solas was not a man to promise forever, though he was afraid of dying alone. Chapters 68 through 82 cover the Protect Clan Lavellan war table mission, the canon story resumes with chapter 83.

Title: Message Sent
Author: Aicosu
Summary: Summary: A wrong number turns into a torrid affair between strangers through texts.
